anya-e0804n0:8_0: I gatiyaṁ. Yesaṁ dhātūnaṁ gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṁ attho. Pavattipāpuṇānipi.
anya-e0804n0:8_2: Tesu kāyagamanaṁ nāma iriyāpathagamanaṁ, ñāṇagamanaṁ nāma ñāṇuppatti,
anya-e0804n0:8_8: Tathā hi ‘‘sīghaṁ gacchatī’’tiādīsu iriyāpathagamanaṁ ‘‘gamana’’nti vuccati. Sundaraṁ nibbānaṁ gato.
anya-e0804n0:8_10: Evaṁ sabbesampi gatyatthānaṁ dhātūnaṁ yathāpayogaṁ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:9_0: Tassimāni rūpāni bhavanti – iti, eti, udeti.
anya-e0804n0:9_1: Kārite ‘‘udāyatī’’ti rūpaṁ bhavati. Uṭṭhāpetīti hi attho, dukāro āgamo. Upeti, samupeti, veti, apeti, aveti, anveti, sameti, abhisameti, samayo, abhisamayo, īdi, udi, ekodi, paṇḍito, ito, udito, upeto, samupeto, anvito, apeto, sameto, etabbo, paccetabbo, paṭiyamāno, paṭicco, ento, adhippeto, adhippāyo, paccayo, aññānipi yojetabbāni. ‘‘Itā,
anya-e0804n0:9_2: ita’’ntiādinā yathārahaṁ itthinapuṁsakavasenapi. Paccetuṁ, upetuṁ, samupetuṁ, anvetuṁ, sametuṁ, abhisametuṁ, icca, paṭicca, samecca, abhisamecca, apecca, upecca, paṭimukhaṁ itvā, itvāna, upetvā, upetvāna, upetuna,
anya-e0804n0:11_0: Idamettha na vattabbaṁ, dassanāyeva me ruto.
anya-e0804n0:17_2: Ayaṁ panettha suttapadattho – yo doso loke ‘‘kodho’’ti lokiyamahājanena vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:17_3: nāyaṁ atthato kodhoti vattabbo. Kinti pana vattabbo,
anya-e0804n0:17_4: eso hi sarīrasaṅkhātaguhāsayo maccurājā eva kodhavasena pamaddanto sattasantāne gacchatīti vattabbo.
anya-e0804n0:17_5: Taṁ evarūpaṁ ‘‘maccurājā’’ti vattabbaṁ bahuno janassa anatthakaraṁ kodhaṁ hitakāmo damena paññāya vīriyena diṭṭhiyā ca chindeyyāti.
anya-e0804n0:18_1: ‘‘Etī’’ti ettha hi āupasaggo sandhikiccena paṭicchannattā na pākaṭo valāhakāvattharito puṇṇacando viya.
anya-e0804n0:18_2: Tathā hi ettha ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:18_3: ākārassa ca ikārena parena saddhiṁyeva ekārādeso. Tasmā ‘‘ayaṁ so sārathī eti.
anya-e0804n0:18_6: Byākaraṇasatthepi hi ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho dissati,
anya-e0804n0:18_7: tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n0:18_8: Atha vā itīti rassavasena vuttaṁ padaṁ gamanaṁ bodheti,
anya-e0804n0:18_9: etīti vuddhivasena vuttaṁ pana yathāpayogaṁ āgamanādīni.
anya-e0804n0:18_10: Mattāvasenapi hi padāni savisesatthāni bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? Sāsane pabbajito, raṭṭhā pabbājitoti. Saññogāsaññogavasenapi, taṁ yathā? Gāmā niggacchati. Yasaṁ poso nigacchati,
anya-e0804n0:18_11: tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:19_0: I gatiyanti kathitā, dhātu vuddhiṁ gatā yadā;
anya-e0804n0:24_0: Āgamane ca hotīti, dhīmā lakkheyya taṁ yathā.
anya-e0804n0:29_0: Tathā hi ītīti anatthāya eti āgacchatīti īti, upaddavo, iti āgamanattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:30_0: Idāni yathārahaṁ nipātākhyātanāmikapariyāpannānaṁ itiito saddānamatthuddhāro vuccate – tattha itisaddo hetuparisamāpanādipadattha vipariyāya pakārāvadhāraṇa nidassanādianekatthappabhedo.
anya-e0804n0:30_1: Tathā hesa ‘‘ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccatī’’tiādīsu hetuatthe dissati.
anya-e0804n0:30_2: ‘‘Tasmātiha me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā,
anya-e0804n0:30_5: ‘‘Iti vā iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato’’tiādīsu ādiattho.
anya-e0804n0:30_6: ‘‘Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṁ nāmakammaṁ nāmadheyyaṁ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo’’tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye.
anya-e0804n0:30_7: ‘‘Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito. Saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito. Saupasaggo bālo,
anya-e0804n0:30_9: ‘‘Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā ādanda atthītissa vacanīyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:30_10: Kiṁ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya,
anya-e0804n0:30_13: natthīti kho kaccāna ayaṁ dutiyo anto’’tiādīsu nidassane.
anya-e0804n0:30_15: ‘‘Itāyaṁ kodharūpenā’’ti ettha pana ākhyātavasena gamane itisaddo dissati. Ayamevattho idhādhippeto,
anya-e0804n0:30_17: viññūnaṁ atthaggahaṇe kosallupādanatthaṁ kevalaṁ atthuddhāravasena āgatoti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Itaro pana –
anya-e0804n0:35_0: Gatyattho icchito ettha, itarattho na icchito;
anya-e0804n0:37_0: Idha pana samayasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ sanibbacanaṁ vattabbampi avatvā upari ayadhātuvisayeyeva vakkhāma i e ayadhātuvasena tidhātumayattā samayasaddassa.
anya-e0804n0:37_2: udetī’’tiādīnañca ekārānantaratyantapadānaṁ aññesañca evarūpānaṁ padamālā yathārahaṁ yebhuyyena attanopadāni vajjetvā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:37_4: Yasmā pana imasmiṁ pakaraṇe sukarā ca dukkarā ca tyantapadamālā jānitabbā ,
anya-e0804n0:37_5: tasmā bhūvādigaṇādīsu aṭṭhasu gaṇesu vihitehi channavutiyā vacanehi sabbasādhāraṇaṁ asabbasādhāraṇañca padamālānayaṁ brūma –
anya-e0804n0:40_0: Iti etī’’ti cetesaṁ, padānaṁ pana pantiyo;
anya-e0804n0:53_0: Ito mutto nayo nāma, natthi koci kriyāpade.
anya-e0804n0:56_0: Idāni ikārānantaratyantapadassa kamo vuccate – iti, inti. Isi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo vattamānānayo. Itu, intu. Ihi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo pañcamīnayo.
anya-e0804n0:56_1: Ettha ca imesaṁ dvinnaṁ sāsanānurūpabhāvassa imāni sādhakapadāni ‘‘veti, apeti, anvetī’’ti. Tattha vi iti veti. Vigacchatīti attho,
anya-e0804n0:56_2: itisaddo hettha gamanaṁ bodheti. Tathā apa iti apeti. Apagacchatīti attho. Anu iti anveti. Anugacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:56_3: Garū pana anu eti anvetīti vadanti. Taṁ –
anya-e0804n0:59_0: Evaṁ taṁ anugacchāmi, putte ādāya pacchato’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:60_0: Imāya pāḷiyā na sameti ‘‘jessantaṁ anvetī’’ti vacanato ‘‘anugacchāmī’’ti vacanato ca.
anya-e0804n0:60_1: Tathā hi etisaddo yattha ce iriyāpathavācako, tattha āgamanaṁyeva joteti, na gamanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:60_2: tasmā āgamanatthassa ayuttito gamanatthassa ca yuttito vi itiādinā chedo ñeyyo.
anya-e0804n0:60_3: Etesañca itisaddavasena katachedānaṁ atthibhāvaṁ yuttibhāvañca ‘‘itāyaṁ kodharūpenā’’ti pāḷiyeva sādheti, tasmāyeva ‘‘anu iti, anu inti,
anya-e0804n0:60_4: anu isī’’tiādinā ‘‘anvetī’’tiādīnaṁ chede labbhamānanayena vuttappakāro vattamānāpañcamīnayo parassapadavasena dassito.
anya-e0804n0:61_0: Imāni pana bhavissantiyā rūpāni, sittā te lahumessati. Issati, issanti. Issasi, issatha. Issāmi, issāma. Issate, issante. Issase, issavhe. Issaṁ, issāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:61_1: Asabbadhātukattepi suddhassarattā dhātussa ikārāgamo na labbhati. Paripuṇṇo bhavissantīnayo.
anya-e0804n0:62_0: Atha kālātipattiyā rūpāni bhavanti, issā, issaṁsu. Isse, issatha. Issaṁ, issamhā. Issatha, issisu. Issase, issavhe. Issaṁ, issāmhase.
anya-e0804n0:62_1: Kālātipattibhāve ca asabbadhātukatte ca santepi suddhassarattā dhātussa akārikārāgamo na labbhati anekantikattā vā anupapannattā ca akārāgamo na hoti.
anya-e0804n0:62_2: Dvinnañhettha suddhassarānaṁ anantarikānaṁ ekatosannipāto anupapatti. Paripuṇṇo kālātipattinayo.
anya-e0804n0:63_0: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane sotūnaṁ payogatthesu paramakosallajananatthaṁ ‘‘nanu te sutaṁ brāhmaṇa bhaññamāne,
anya-e0804n0:63_1: devā na issanti purisaparakkamassā’’ti pāḷito nayaṁ gahetvā vuttappakārehi bhavissantiyā rūpehi sabbaso samānāni asamānatthāni vattamānikarūpāni ca īsakaṁ aññamaññaṁ samānāni bhavissantīkālātipattīnaṁ rūpāni ca pakāsayissāma – vattamānāvasena tāva ‘‘issati, issanti. Issasi,
anya-e0804n0:65_0: Eti, enti. Esi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n0:66_0: Etu, entu. Ehi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n0:67_0: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṁ, vissāsaṁ eyya paṇḍito;
anya-e0804n0:69_0: Yadā te pahiṇissāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya.
anya-e0804n0:70_0: Eyya , eyyuṁ. Eyyāsi, eyyātha. Eyyāmi, eyyāma. Etha, eraṁ. Etho, eyyāvho. Eyyaṁ, eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:71_0: So puriso eyya, te eyyuṁ. Tvaṁ eyyāsi, tumhe eyyātha. Ahaṁ eyyāmi, mayaṁ eyyāma. So puriso etha, te eraṁ. Tvaṁ etho, tumhe eyyāvho. Ahaṁ eyyaṁ, mayaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:73_0: Essati, essanti. Essasi, essatha. Essāmi, essāma. Essate, essante. Essase, essavhe. Essaṁ, essāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:75_0: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:76_0: ‘‘Abhidosagato idāni ehī’’ti vacanadassanato aparānipi bhavissantīrūpāni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:77_0: Ehiti, ehinti. Ehisi, ehitha. Ehimi, ehima. Ehite, ehinte. Ehise, ehivhe. Ehissaṁ, ehissāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:78_0: Essā, essaṁsu. Esse, essatha. Essaṁ essāmhā. Essatha, essisu. Essase, essavhe. Essiṁ, essāmhase.
anya-e0804n0:80_0: Udeti, udenti; Udesi, udetha; Udemi, udema.
anya-e0804n0:81_0: Udetu, udentu. Udehi, udetha. Udemi, udema, udāmase.
anya-e0804n0:82_0: Udeyya, udeyyuṁ. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Udissati, udissanti. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Udissā, udissaṁsu. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:85_0: Kusadde ke ca. Koti, kavati, kāyati, evaṁ kattupadāni bhavanti. Kuyyati, kiyyati, evaṁ kammapadāni. Kānanaṁ, kabbaṁ, jātakaṁ, evaṁ nāmikapadāni. Kutvā, kutvāna, kavitvā, kavitvāna, kāvitvā, kāvitvāna, kāyituṁ, evaṁ abyayapadāni.
anya-e0804n0:86_0: Tatra kānananti ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye kavati saddaṁ karotīti kānanaṁ, vanaṁ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:88_0: Saṇateva brahāraññaṁ, sā rati paṭibhāti ma’’nti
anya-e0804n0:89_1: Atha vā kokilamayūrādayo kavanti saddāyanti kūjanti etthāti kānanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:89_2: Manoharatāya avassaṁ kuyyati paṇḍitehīti kabbaṁ. Kāviyaṁ. Kāveyyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:89_3: Aññatra pana kavīnaṁ idanti kabbanti taddhitavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:89_10: Aññatra pana jātaṁ eva jātakanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:89_11: Tathā hi jātakasaddo desanāyampi vattati ‘‘itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhamma’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:90_2: Nīcasaddo hi hīnavācako ‘‘nīce kule paccājāto’’ti ettha viya.
anya-e0804n0:90_5: tattha tattha nāmikapadaṁ upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṁ. Kriyāpadameva hi duddasaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:90_6: kriyāpade vijjamāne nāmikapadaṁ natthīti na vattabbaṁ, tasmā antamaso ‘‘pakkanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:90_7: takanaṁ’’ iccevamādīni bhāvavācakāni nāmikapadāni sabbāsu dhātūsu yathārahaṁ labbhantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:92_0: Taki kicchajīvane. Kicchajīvanaṁ kasirajīvanaṁ. Taṅkati. Ātaṅkati. Ātaṅko.
anya-e0804n0:92_2: tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘appābādhaṁ appātaṅka’’nti imasmiṁ pāḷippadese iti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ ‘‘ābādhoti visabhāgavedanā vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:92_3: yā ekadese uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṁ ayapaṭṭena bandhitvā viya gaṇhāti.
anya-e0804n0:92_5: Atha vā yāpetabbarogo ātaṅko, itaro ābādho. Khuddako vā rogo ātaṅko, balavā ābādho.
anya-e0804n0:97_0: Suka gatiyaṁ. Sokati, suko, sukī. Tatra sukoti suvo.
anya-e0804n0:97_1: Sokati manāpena gamanena gacchatīti suko. Tassa bhariyā sukī.
anya-e0804n0:98_1: Idha bhassanaṁ nāma sunakhabhassanaṁ adhippetaṁ ‘‘sunakho bhassitvā’’ti ettha viya,
anya-e0804n0:98_2: na ‘‘āvāso gocaraṁ bhassa’’ntiādīsu viya. Vacanasaṅkhātaṁ bhassanaṁ, bukkati sā.
anya-e0804n0:99_0: Dhaka paṭighāte gatiyañca. Paṭighāto paṭihananaṁ. Dhakati.
anya-e0804n0:100_0: Caka tittipaṭighātesu. Titti tappanaṁ, paṭighātaṁ paṭihananaṁva. Cakati.
anya-e0804n0:101_1: Etā kuādikā akapariyantā dhātuyo parassa bhāsāti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Tesaṁ mate etā ‘‘ti anti,
anya-e0804n0:101_2: tu antu’’ iccādīnaṁyeva visayo. Pāḷiyaṁ pana niyamo natthi, tasmā na taṁ idha pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:102_1: Ajjhayanaṁ uccāraṇaṁ sikkhanaṁ vā, ayati, adhīyati, ajjhayati, adhīte, ajjhenaṁ, ajjhāyako. Dibbaṁ adhīyase māyaṁ. Adhīyanti mahārāja, dibbamāyidha paṇḍitā.
anya-e0804n0:102_3: Tattha ajjhāyakoti ajjhayatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:103_1: Ettha ‘‘yo ātumānaṁ sayameva pāvā’’ti pāḷi papubbassa udhātussa payogoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:104_1: Vaṅkasaddo hi vakkasaddena samānattho, vakkasaddo ca vaṅkasaddena. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:106_0: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṁ saraṇato bhaya’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:107_1: Ayaṁ pana vakkasaddo sakkaṭabhāsaṁ patvā kakārarakārasaññogakkhariko bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:107_2: dhātubhāvo panassa porāṇehi na vutto, tasmā kriyāpadaṁ na diṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:107_3: Imassa pana vaṅkasaddassa ‘‘vaṅka koṭille’’ti dhātubhāvo vutto, ‘‘vaṅkatī’’ti kriyāpadañca,
anya-e0804n0:107_7: Tatta vaṅkatīti kriyāpadaṁ pāḷiyaṁ avijjamānampi gahetabbameva nāthatīti kriyāpadamiva.
anya-e0804n0:107_8: Bhāvavācakassa pana vaṅkasaddassa atthitā natthitā ca pāḷiādīsu punappunaṁ upaparikkhitabbā.
anya-e0804n0:107_11: Ettha pana aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vaṅkaṁ aṭṭhavaṅkaṁ, na aṭṭhavaṅkāni yassāti. Dabbavācako hi vaṅkasaddo, na bhāvavācakoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:111_0: Baḷise giribhede ca, vattate sa pumā tadā.
anya-e0804n0:112_0: Ayañhi ‘‘te’me janā vaṅkaghastā sayanti. Yathāpi maccho baḷisaṁ, vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chāditaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:113_0: Ettha siyā ‘‘nanu ca bho ‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:113_1: vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chādita’nti ettha vaṅkasaddo guṇavācako visesanasado, yena baḷiso visesito,
anya-e0804n0:113_2: tena vaṅkaṁ kuṭilaṁ baḷisanti attho viññāyatī’’ti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n0:113_3: vaṅkasadde avuttepi baḷisasabhāvassa vaṅkattā kuṭilattho pākaṭoti natthi visesanasaddena payojanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:113_4: Idaṁ pana ‘‘baḷisaṁ vaṅka’’nti vacanaṁ ‘‘hatthi nāgo. Saroruhaṁ padumaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:113_8: dantiṁ anveti hatthinī’’ti ettha nāgasaddassa dantīsaddassa ca aññamaññapariyā yavacanattepi dantinti manoramadantayuttanti attho saṁvaṇṇito,
anya-e0804n0:113_9: tathā ‘‘baḷisaṁ vaṅka’’nti imesampi aññamaññaṁ pariyāyavacanattepi vaṅkanti kuṭilanti attho vattabbo.
anya-e0804n0:113_10: Evañhi sati attho sālarājā viya suphullito hoti, desanā ca vilāsappattā,
anya-e0804n0:113_11: na pana ‘‘vaṅkaṁ baḷisa’’nti saddānaṁ guṇaguṇīvasena samānādhikaraṇabhāvo icchitabbo ‘‘buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṁ viharatī’’tiādīsu ‘‘buddho bhagavā’’ti imesaṁ viya samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa anicchitabbattā.
anya-e0804n0:113_12: Na hi īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo porāṇehi anumato.
anya-e0804n0:116_0: ‘‘Buddhaṁ buddhaṁ nikhilavisayaṁ suddhiyā yāva suddhi’’nti ca ādīsu pana anumato.
anya-e0804n0:116_1: Ettha hi ‘‘etādiso’’ti ca ‘‘appaṭipuggalo’’ti ca ‘‘tathāgato’’ti ca ‘‘balappatto’’ti ca ‘‘sambuddho’’ti ca ‘‘parinibbuto’’ti ca imāni ‘‘satthā’’ti anena padena samānādhikaraṇāni.
anya-e0804n0:116_2: Tathā ‘‘buddhaṁ buddha’’nti dvinnaṁ padānaṁ pacchimaṁ purimena samānādhikaraṇaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:117_1: vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chādita’’nti ettha vaṅkasaddo baḷisassābhidhānantaraṁ, na guṇavācako.
anya-e0804n0:117_2: Evaṁ vaṅkasaddo baḷise vattati. ‘‘Kaṅkaṁ gacchāma pabbataṁ.
anya-e0804n0:117_4: Ettha ca ‘‘vaṅkapabbato’’ti vattabbe sukhuccāraṇatthaṁ niruttinayena majjhe animittaṁ takārāgamaṁ katvā ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṁ. Atha vā vaṅkoyeva vaṅkatā, yathā devo eva devatā. Yathā ca disā eva disatāti,
anya-e0804n0:117_5: evaṁ tāpaccayavasena vaṅkatā ca sā pabbato cāti ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:117_7: Atha vā vaṅkamassa saṇṭhānamatthīti vaṅkatoti mantuatthe tapaccayo,
anya-e0804n0:117_9: Evaṁ vaṅkato ca so pabbato cāti vaṅkatapabbato.
anya-e0804n0:118_2: Curādigaṇaṁ pana patvā imissā ‘‘loketi, lokayati, oloketi,
anya-e0804n0:118_4: Lokoti tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti. Tattha ‘‘eko loko,
anya-e0804n0:118_5: sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti āgato saṅkhāro eva loko saṅkhāraloko. Sattā eva loko sattaloko.
anya-e0804n0:118_9: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā lokoti vuccatī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:118_10: Lokiyati ettha puññapāpaṁ tabbipāko cāti satto loko.
anya-e0804n0:118_11: Lokiyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto okāso loko.
anya-e0804n0:118_15: Atha vā lokoti tayo lokā kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti.
anya-e0804n0:118_17: Bahiddhā pana kavīhi ‘‘loko tu bhuvane jane’’ti ettakameva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:119_0: Siloka saṅghāte. Saṅghāto piṇḍanaṁ. Silokati, siloko, silokamanukassāmi.
anya-e0804n0:119_1: Akkharapadaniyamito vacanasaṅghāto siloko. So pajjanti vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:119_2: tathā hi ‘‘siloko yasassi pajje’’ti kavayo vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:120_0: Deka dheka saddussāhesu. Saddo ravo, ussāho vāyāmo. Dekati. Dhekati.
anya-e0804n0:121_0: Reka saki saṅkāyaṁ. Rekati. Saṅkati, tasmiṁ me saṅkate mano. Saṅkā.
anya-e0804n0:124_1: Lolabhāvo loliyaṁ yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Kakati, kāko, kākī. Ettha ‘‘kāko, dhaṅko, vāyaso, bali, bhoji,
anya-e0804n0:125_0: Kuka vaka ādāne. Kukati, vakati, koko, vako. Ettha kokoti araññasunakho. Vakoti khuddakavanadīpiko, byagghotipi vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:126_0: Vaka dittiyaṁ paṭighāte ca. Ditti sobhā, vakati.
anya-e0804n0:127_0: Kakivaki sakka tika ṭika seka gatyatthā. Kaṅkati, vaṅkati, sakkati, nisakkati, parisakkati, osakkati, vadhāya parisakkanaṁ. Biḷāranisakkamattampi. Tekati, ṭekati, ṭīkā sekati.
anya-e0804n0:127_1: Ettha ṭīkāti ṭikiyati jāniyati saṁvaṇṇanāya attho etāyāti ṭīkā.
anya-e0804n0:127_2: Etā idhātuādikā sekapariyantā dhātuyo ‘‘attanobhāsā’’ti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Tesaṁ mate etā ‘‘te ante,
anya-e0804n0:127_3: taṁ antaṁ’’iccādīnaṁyeva visayo, pāvacane pana niyamo natthi.
anya-e0804n0:128_1: Abyattasaddo avibhāvitatthasaddo niratthakasaddo ca. Hikkati, hikkate.
anya-e0804n0:128_5: bādhatī’’tiādinā yebhuyyena dvidhā dvidhā rūpāni sāsane dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:131_1: Pakathanaṁ ācikkhanaṁ desanaṁ vā. Khāti, saṅkhāti.
anya-e0804n0:131_3: ākārassa ca saññogapubbattā rassattaṁ, akkhāti. Akkhāsi purisuttamo. Akkheyyaṁ te ahaṁ ayye. Dhammo saṅkhāyati. Akkhāyati. Atra pana kakāralopo. Svākhāto bhagavatā dhammo. Saṅkhāto. Akkhāto. Akkhātāro tathāgatā.
anya-e0804n0:131_6: Keci pana ‘‘svākhāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākkhyāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākhyāto’’ti ca padamicchanti.
anya-e0804n0:131_7: Tattha pacchimāni sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṁ gahetvā vuttāni,
anya-e0804n0:131_10: Tattha saṅkhāsaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate – saṅkhāsaddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanāsu dissati.
anya-e0804n0:134_1: Sāsanānurūpena sare ikārassa iyyādeso, khiyyati. ‘‘Khayo, khaṁ’’ iccapi rūpāni ñeyyāni.
anya-e0804n0:134_3: Atha vā khiyanti kilesā etthāti khayo, magganibbānāni.
anya-e0804n0:134_5: Khanti tucchaṁ suññaṁ vivittaṁ rittaṁ, khanti vā ākāso.
anya-e0804n0:135_2: Ayaṁ divādigaṇepi pakkhipitabbo. Khaṁ khayaṁ. Abhiramaṇīyaṁ rājakkhayaṁ. Tattha khīyatīti nivasati.
anya-e0804n0:135_3: Khanti cakkhādiindriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṁ nivāsaṭṭhena. Khayanti nivesanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:141_0: Khe khādanasattāsu. Khāyati. Undūrā khāyanti. Vikkhāyitakaṁ. Gokhāyitakaṁ. Assirī viya khāyati. Disāpi me na pakkhāyanti. Etthādimhi kāyatīti khādati. Atha vā upaṭṭhāti paññāyati.
anya-e0804n0:142_2: sukhanaṁ dukkhananti vuttaṁ hoti. Akammakā ime dhātavo. Sukhati, dukkhati. Sukhaṁ, dukkhaṁ. Sukhito, dukkhito. Sukhaṁ sātaṁ pīṇanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:142_4: Tattha sukhanti sukhayatīti sukhaṁ. Yassuppajjati, taṁ sukhitaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:142_5: Dukkhanti dukkhayatīti dukkhaṁ. Yassuppajjati, taṁ dukkhitaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:142_6: Imāni nibbacanāni kāritavasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ sukhadukkhasaddatthaṁ vadantehi garūhi sukhayati dukkhayatisaddānaṁ kammatthamādāya vivaraṇassa katattā.
anya-e0804n0:142_7: Tathā hi ‘‘sukheti sukhayati, sukhāpeti sukhāpayati, dukkheti dukkhayati,
anya-e0804n0:142_8: dukkhāpeti dukkhāpayatī’’ti imāni tesaṁ kāritapadarūpāni, attānaṁ sukheti pīṇetīti ca, sukhayati sukhaṁ, dukkhayatīti dukkhanti ca,
anya-e0804n0:147_1: Saddasatthe pana dhātupāṭhasaṅkhepe ca ime dhātavo curādigaṇeyeva vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:147_3: Mayaṁ tu tesaṁ tabbacanaṁ suddhakattari ca tāni padarūpāni na icchāma pāḷiādīhi viruddhattā,
anya-e0804n0:147_5: Ayañhi suddhakattuvisaye asmākaṁ ruci ‘‘sukhatīti sukhito, dukkhatīti dukkhito’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:148_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘sukhati dukkhatī’’ti kriyāpadāni buddhavacane na dissantīti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:148_1: evaṁ santepi aṭṭhakathānayavasena gahetabbattā dissantiyeva nāma.
anya-e0804n0:148_2: Na hi sabbathā sabbesaṁ dhātūnaṁ rūpāni sāsane loke vā labbhanti, ekaccāni pana labbhanti, ekaccāni na labbhanti.
anya-e0804n0:148_4: ‘‘Kappayavho patissatā’’ti hi diṭṭhe ‘‘caravho bhuñjavho’’tiādīnipi nayavasena diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.
anya-e0804n0:149_1: Visuddhimaggādīsu hi ‘‘ekadviyojanamattampi addhānaṁ gatassa vāyo kuppati,
anya-e0804n0:149_2: gattāni dukkhantī’’ti evaṁ bhūvādigaṇikaṁ akammakaṁ suddhakattuvācakaṁ ‘‘dukkhantī’’ti kriyāpadaṁ dissati. Tasmiṁ diṭṭhiyeva ‘‘sukhati, sukhanti. Sukhasi, sukhatha. Sukhāmi,
anya-e0804n0:149_4: dukkhathā’’tiādīnica diṭṭhāni nāma honti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa tādisassa anavajjassa nayassa gahetabbattā, tasmā ‘‘sukhatīti sukhito,
anya-e0804n0:149_5: dukkhatīti dukkhito’’ti bhūvādinayo eva gahetabbo, na pana curādinayo. Aparampettha nibbacanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:149_6: sukhaṁ sañjātaṁ etassāti sukhito, sañjātasukhoti attho. Esa nayo dukkhitoti etthāpi.
anya-e0804n0:149_7: Atha vā sukhena ito pavattoti sukhito.
anya-e0804n0:150_0: Mokkha muccane. Akammakoyaṁ dhātu. Mokkhati. Mokkho. Pātimokkho. Kārite ‘‘mokkheti, mokkhayati, mokkhāpeti, mokkhāpayatī’’ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:150_1: Keci panimaṁ ‘‘mokkha mocane’’ti paṭhitvā curādigaṇe pakkhipanti. Tesaṁ mate ‘‘mokkheti,
anya-e0804n0:150_4: Tathā hi ‘‘mokkhanti mārabandhanā. Na me samaṇe mokkhasi. Mahāyaññaṁ yajissāma,
anya-e0804n0:150_5: evaṁ mokkhāma pāpakā’’ti pāḷiyā virujjhanti. ‘‘Yo naṁ pāti rakkhati,
anya-e0804n0:150_6: taṁ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkho’’ti aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti,
anya-e0804n0:150_13: Evaṁ imassa dhātuno suddhakattuvisaye akammakabhāvo vidito,
anya-e0804n0:150_14: hetukattuvisaye ekakammakabhāvo vidito muca paca chidādayo viya. Mokkhadhātu dvigaṇikoti ce? Na,
anya-e0804n0:152_0: Okha rākha lākha dākha dhākha sosanālamatthesu. Okhati. Rākhati. Lākhati. Dākhati. Dhākhati.
anya-e0804n0:154_0: Ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi gatyatthā. Ukhati. Nakhati. Makhati. Rakhati. Lakhati. Raṅkhati. Laṅkhati. Iṅkhati. Riṅkhati.
anya-e0804n0:155_0: Rakkha pālane. Rakkhati. Rakkhā, rakkhaṇaṁ, sīlaṁ rakkhito devadatto, sīlaṁ rakkhitaṁ devadattena, sīlaṁ rakkhako devadatto.
anya-e0804n0:158_1: Ettha nakkhattanti etto ito cāti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:158_2: Porāṇā pana ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī’’ti kathayiṁsu. ‘‘Nakkhattaṁ, joti, nirikkhaṁ, bhaṁ’’ iccete pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n0:163_0: Kakhi vakhi makhi kaṅkhāyaṁ. Satthari kaṅkhati. Vaṅkhati, maṅkhati.
anya-e0804n0:163_1: ‘‘Kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṁ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṁ dvedhāpatho saṁsayo anekaṁsagāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṁ cittassa manovilekho’’ iccete kaṅkhāpariyāyā. Etesu pana –
anya-e0804n0:166_0: Kakhi iccāyaṁ. Dhanaṁ kaṅkhati, abhikaṅkhati, nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṁ. Abhikaṅkhitaṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:167_0: Dakhi dhakhi ghoravāsite kaṅkhāyañca. Daṅkhati. Dhaṅkhati.
anya-e0804n0:170_0: Jakkha bhakkhaṇe ca. Hasanānukaḍḍhanatthaṁ cakāro. Jakkhati.
anya-e0804n0:171_0: Likha lekhane. Likhati, sallekhati. Atisallekhatevāyaṁ samaṇo. Lekhā, lekhanaṁ, lekhako, likhitaṁ, sallekhapaṭipatti,
anya-e0804n0:172_1: Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘dhukkhate dhikkhate’’ti attanobhāsaṁ vadanti. Tathā ito parāni rūpānipi.
anya-e0804n0:173_0: Rukkha vakkha varaṇe. Varaṇaṁ saṁvaraṇaṁ. Rukkhati. Vakkhati. Rukkho, vakkho. Ettha ca vakkhoti rukkhoyeva.
anya-e0804n0:173_2: santi vakkhā araññajā’’ti jātakapāṭho dissati. Imāni pana rukkhassa nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:175_0: Ago nago kujo sākhī, sālo ca viṭapī taru;
anya-e0804n0:176_0: Dumo phalī tu phalavā, gaccho tu khuddapādapo’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:177_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu ca sālasaddena sālarukkhoyeva vutto,
anya-e0804n0:177_2: atha kimatthaṁ sālasaddena yo koci rukkho vutto’’ti?
anya-e0804n0:177_4: atha kho sālarukkhepi vanappatijeṭṭharukkhepi yasmiṁ kasmiñci rukkhepi ‘‘sālo’’ti vohārassa dassanato aññepi rukkhā vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:177_6: Yathāha ‘‘seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahantaṁ sālavanaṁ, tañcassa elaṇḍehi sañchannaṁ. Antarena yamakasālāna’’nti. Vanappatijeṭṭharukkhopi. Yathāha –
anya-e0804n0:180_1: Yathāha ‘‘atha kho taṁ bhikkhave māluvabījaṁ aññatarasmiṁ sālamūle nipateyyā’’ti. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:185_0: Sikkha vijjopādāne. Sikkhati. Sikkhā, sikkhanaṁ, sikkhitaṁ sippaṁ, sikkhako, sikkhito, sekkho, asekkho.
anya-e0804n0:185_2: Tattha sikkhitoti sañjātasikkho, asikkhīti vā sikkhito,
anya-e0804n0:185_3: tathā hi kattuppayogo dissati ‘‘ahaṁ kho pana susikkhito anavayo sake ācariyake kumbhakārakamme’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:186_0: Bhikkha yācane. Bhikkhati. Bhikkhu, bhikkhā, bhikkhanaṁ, bhikkhako, bhikkhitaṁ bhojanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:186_1: Ettha pana ‘‘bhikkhu yati samaṇo muni pabbajito anagāro tapassī tapodhano’’ iccetāni pariyāyavacanāni.
anya-e0804n0:187_0: Dakkha vuddhiyaṁ sīghatte ca. Dakkhati, dakkhiṇā, dakkho.
anya-e0804n0:187_1: Dakkhanti vaddhanti sattā etāya yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti dakkhiṇā, dātabbavatthu.
anya-e0804n0:187_2: Dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṁ gacchatīti dakkho, cheko, yo ‘‘kusalo’’tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:188_0: Dikkha muṇḍiopanayananiyamabbatādesesu. Dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye, upanayane, niyame, vate, ādese ca pavattati. Dikkhati. Dikkhito muṇḍo.
anya-e0804n0:188_1: Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho sarabhaṅgajātake ‘‘gandho isīnaṁ ciradikkhitānaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:188_2: kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā’’ti etasmiṁ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi ‘‘ciradikkhitānanti cirapabbajitāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:188_4: Evaṁ sante kasmā idha ‘‘dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye vuttā’’ti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:188_5: tattha pana dikkhitasaddassa pabbajite vattanato ‘‘cirapabbajitāna’’nti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:188_8: Tāpasā hi muṇḍiyatthavācakena dikkhitasaddena vattuṁ yuttā.
anya-e0804n0:188_9: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi cakkavattisuttatthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā’’ti imissā pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇe ‘‘tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṁ kesamassuṁ ohārenti,
anya-e0804n0:188_11: tena vuttaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā’’ti evaṁ attho saṁvaṇṇito.
anya-e0804n0:189_0: Ikkha dassanaṅkesu. Ikkhati, upekkhati, apekkhati. Upekkhā, apekkhā, paccavekkhaṇā. Kakāralope ‘‘upekhā, apekhā,
anya-e0804n0:191_0: Cikkha cakkha viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Cikkhati, ācikkhati, abbhācikkhati. Ācikkhako. Cakkhati, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n0:191_2: samavisamaṁ abhibyattaṁ vadantaṁ viya hotīti attho. Atha vā ‘‘sūpaṁ cakkhati,
anya-e0804n0:191_3: madhuṁ cakkhatī’’tiādīsu viya yasmā assādatthopi cakkhusaddo bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:191_4: tasmā ‘‘cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ assādentaṁ viya hotī’’ti assādatthopi gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:191_5: ‘‘Cakkhuṁ kho māgaṇḍiyaṁ rūpārāmaṁ rūparataṁ rūpasammudita’’nti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:191_6: Satipi sotādīnaṁ saddārāmatādibhāve nirūḷhattā nayane eva cakkhusaddo pavattati paṅkajādisaddā viya padumādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:197_0: Gu karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo vaccakaraṇaṁ. Gavati. Ge sadde. Gāyati. Gītaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:198_1: Ettha samudāyavasena vagganaṁ pavattanaṁ vaggo. Vaggitanti gamanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:198_2: Tathā hi nāgapetavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘yo so majjhe assatarīrathena catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena.
anya-e0804n0:198_4: amaccharī dānapatī virocatī’’ti imissā pāḷiyā atthaṁ vadantehi ‘‘suvaggitenāti sundaragamanenā’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:198_5: Kiñci bhiyyo kriyāpadampi ca diṭṭhaṁ ‘‘dhunanti vagganti pavattanti cambare’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:199_0: Ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi gamane ca. Cakāro gatipekkhako. Raṅgati. Raṅgo. Laṅgati. Laṅgo, laṅgī. Aṅgati, aṅgeti. Aṅgo, samaṅgī, samaṅgitā, aṅgaṁ, aṅgaṇaṁ. Vaṅgati. Vaṅgo. Maṅgati. Maṅgo, upaṅgo, maṅgalaṁ. Iṅgati. Iṅgitaṁ. Riṅgati. Riṅganaṁ. Liṅgati. Liṅganaṁ. Ulliṅgati, ulliṅganaṁ. Taṅgati. Taṅganaṁ. Saṅgati. Saṅganaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:199_1: Tattha aṅganti yesaṁ kesañci vatthūnaṁ avayavo,
anya-e0804n0:199_4: Rāgādayo hi aṅganti etehi taṁsamaṅgipuggalā nihīnabhāvaṁ gacchantīti ‘‘aṅgaṇānī’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:199_5: Katthaci malaṁ vā paṅko vā ‘‘tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī’’tiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:199_8: Añjati tattha ṭhitaṁ atisundaratāya abhibyañjetīti hi aṅgaṇaṁ, vivaṭo bhūmippadeso. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n0:204_1: Ca kāro anantaravuttāpekkhako. Lagati. Ca jato na hoti laganaṁ. Baḷise laggo.
anya-e0804n0:206_0: Agga kuṭilagatiyaṁ. Aggatīti aggi, kuṭilaṁ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:207_0: Aggi dhūmasikho joti, jātavedo sikhī gini;
anya-e0804n0:214_0: Gu uggame. Uggamo uggamanaṁ pākaṭatā. Gavati.
anya-e0804n0:217_0: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāti. Ghānaṁ. Gandhaṁ ghatvā.
anya-e0804n0:217_2: Etissā pana divādigaṇaṁ pattāya ‘‘ghāyati ghāyitvā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:219_0: Jaggha hasane. Jagghati, sañjagghati. Sañjagghittho mayā saha. Jagghitumpi na sobhati. Jagghitvā.
anya-e0804n0:221_1: Āghānaṁ ghānena gandhānubhavanaṁ. Siṅghati, upasiṅghati. Upasiṅghitvā. Ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:223_0: Raghi laghi gatyakkhepe. Gatyakkhepo gatiyā akkhepo. Raṅghati, laṅghati, ullaṅghati. Laṅghitā, ullaṅghikāpīti, laṅghitvā.
anya-e0804n0:224_0: Maghi ketave ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkho. Maṅghati.
anya-e0804n0:226_0: Dāgha āyāse ca. Āyāso kilamanaṁ. Cakāro sāmatthiyāpekkhako. Dāghati. Nidāgho.
anya-e0804n0:227_0: Silāgha katthane. Katthanaṁ pasaṁsanaṁ. Silāghati. Silāghā. Buddhassa silāghate. Silāghitvā.
anya-e0804n0:233_0: Suca soke. Socati. Soko, socanā, socaṁ, socanto, socantī, socantaṁ kulaṁ, socitvā.
anya-e0804n0:234_0: Kuca sadde tāre. Tārasaddo accuccasaddo. Kocati. Uccasaddaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:235_0: Kuñca koṭilla’ppībhāvesu. Kuñcati. Kuñcikā, kuñcitakeso. Kuñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:236_0: Luñca apanayane. Luñcati. Luñcako, luñcituṁ, luñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:237_0: Añcu gatipūjanāsu. Maggaṁ añcati. Buddhaṁ añcati.
anya-e0804n0:237_1: Uddhaṁ anuggantvā tiriyaṁ añcitoti tiracchāno. Kaṭukañcukatā.
anya-e0804n0:238_0: Vañcu cañcu tañcu gatiyaṁ. Vañcati. Cañcati. Tañcati. Mañcati. Santi pādā avañcanā.
anya-e0804n0:239_0: Gucu gaṇecu theyyakaraṇe. Thenanaṁ theyyaṁ, corikā. Tassa kriyā theyyakaraṇaṁ. Gocati. Gaṇecati.
anya-e0804n0:244_0: Taca saṁvaraṇe. Saṁvaraṇaṁ rakkhaṇaṁ. Tacati. Taco.
anya-e0804n0:248_0: Vaca viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Viyattassa esā viyatti, tissaṁ viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:248_2: Viyattassa hi vadato puggalassa vasena vācā viyattā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:248_4: na evaṁ vacanasaṅkhāto saddo ‘‘abyattasaddo’’ti vuccati viññātatthattā. ‘‘Vatti, vacati, vacanti.
anya-e0804n0:248_6: vācenti’’ iccādīni hetukattupadāni. ‘‘Atthābhisamayā dhīro, paṇḍitoti pavuccati. Vuccanti. Santo sappurisā loke,
anya-e0804n0:248_8: Garū pana vakārassa ukārādesavasena ‘‘uttaṁ uccate uccante’’tiādīni icchanti, tāni sāsane appasiddhāni, sakkaṭabhāsānulomāni.
anya-e0804n0:248_9: Sāsanasmiñhi rakārāgamavisaye nipubbasseva vacassa vassa ukārādeso siddho ‘‘nirutti, niruttaṁ, nerutta’’nti. Vacanaṁ, vācā, vaco, vacī, vuttaṁ, pavuttaṁ, vuccamānaṁ, adhivacanaṁ, vattabbaṁ, vacanīyaṁ, imāni nāmikapadāni. Vattuṁ, vattave, vatvā, vatvāna,
anya-e0804n0:249_4: vacantītiādīni kriyāpadarūpāni buddhavacane aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu satthesu ca anāgatattā chaḍḍetabbānī’’ti. Tanna, yasmā sāsane ‘‘avaca,
anya-e0804n0:249_8: vacantī’’tiādīni rūpāni gahetabbāni. Vaceyya, vuccatu, vucceyya.
anya-e0804n0:250_0: Parokkhārūpāni vadāma – vaca, vacu. Vace, vacittha. Vacaṁ, vacimha. Vacittha, vacire. Vacittho, vacivho. Vaciṁ, vacimhe.
anya-e0804n0:251_0: Hiyyattanīrūpāni vadāma – avacā, avacū. Avaco, avacuttha. Avocaṁ, avacumha. Avacuttha, avacutthuṁ. Avacase, avacuvhaṁ. Avaciṁ, avacamhase.
anya-e0804n0:252_0: Ajjatanīrūpāni vadāma – avaci, avocuṁ, avaciṁsu. Avoco, avocuttha. Avociṁ, avocumha. Avocā, avocu. Avacase, avocivaṁ. Avocaṁ, avocimhe.
anya-e0804n0:253_0: Bhavissantīrūpāni vadāma – vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasi, vakkhatha. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma. Vakkhate, vakkhante. Vakkhase, vakkhavhe. Vakkhassaṁ vakkhamhe.
anya-e0804n0:254_3: Vakkhasī’’tiādīni vatvā avasāne uttamapurisekavacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘vakkhemī’’ti vattabbaṁ. Attho panimesaṁ ‘‘rosati, rosantī’’tiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0804n0:254_5: Aparānipi vacadhātussa bhavissantī sahitāni rūpāni bhavanti – vakkhissati, vakkhissanti. Vakkhissasi, vakkhissatha. Vakkhissāmi, vakkhissāma. Vakkhissate, vakkhissante. Vakkhissase, vakkhissavhe. Vakkhissaṁ, vakkhissāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:257_0: Imamhi kappe caritaṁ, pavakkhissaṁ suṇohi me’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:258_0: Gadratapañhepi ‘‘rājā tumhehi saddhiṁ paṭisanthāraṁ katvā gahapati patirūpaṁ āsanaṁ ñatvā nisīdathāti vakkhissatī’’ti evamādiaṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati,
anya-e0804n0:258_3: vakkhissantī’’tiādīni bhavanti. Attho panimesaṁ ‘‘rosissati, rosissantī’’tiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0804n0:259_0: Avacissā, vacissā, avacissaṁsu, vacissaṁsu. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:259_1: Idha pana vuttasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vattabbampi avatvā upariyeva kathessāma ito ativiya vattabbaṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0804n0:260_0: Cu cavane. Cavati. Kārite ‘‘cāvetī’’ti rūpaṁ. Devakāyā cuto. Cutaṁ padumaṁ. Cavituṁ, cavitvā.
anya-e0804n0:265_0: Maca muci kakkane. Kakkanaṁ sarīre ubbaṭṭanaṁ. Macati. Muñcati. Maci dhāraṇucchāyapūjanesu.
anya-e0804n0:265_1: Dhāraṇaṁ ucchāyo pūjananti tayo atthā. Tattha ucchāyo malaharaṇaṁ. Mañcati. Mañco, mañcanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:266_0: Paca byattikaraṇe. Pacati. Pāko, paripāko, vipāko, pakkaṁ phalaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:269_0: Rucadittiyaṁ rocane ca. Ditti sobhā. Rocanaṁ ruci. Rocati. Verocano. Samaṇassa rocate saccaṁ. Tassa te saggakāmassa, ekattamuparocitaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:269_1: Ayañca divādigaṇe ruciatthaṁ gahetvā ‘‘ruccatī’’ti rūpaṁ janeti.
anya-e0804n0:269_3: Curādigaṇe pana ruciatthaṁ gahetvā ‘‘roceti rocayatī’’ti rūpāni janeti.
anya-e0804n0:269_4: Tena ‘‘kiṁ nu jātiṁ na rocesī’’tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti. Tegaṇikoyaṁ dhātu.
anya-e0804n0:272_0: Yāca yācanāyaṁ. Brāhmaṇo nāgaṁ maṇiṁ yācati. Nāgo maṇiṁ yācito brāhmaṇena. Te taṁ asse ayācisuṁ. So taṁ rathamayācatha. Devadattaṁ āyācati.
anya-e0804n0:272_2: Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇena nāgaṁ maṇiṁ yāceti, yācayati, yācāpeti, yācāpayati. Evaṁ hetukattari.
anya-e0804n0:272_3: Rājā brāhmaṇena dhanaṁ yāciyati, yācayiyati, yācāpiyati, yācāpayiyati. Evaṁ kammani. Yācaṁ, yācanto, yācantī, yācantaṁ kulaṁ. Yācamāno, yācamānā, yācamānaṁ kulaṁ. Yācako, yācanā, yācitabbaṁ, yācituṁ, yācitvāna, yācituna, yāciya, yāciyāna.
anya-e0804n0:273_2: Yathā pana sāsane ‘‘paṇḍitoti pavuccatī’’ti vacadhātussa kammani rūpaṁ pasiddhaṁ, na tathā pacadhātussa.
anya-e0804n0:273_3: Evaṁ santepi garū ‘‘tayā paccate odano’’ti tassa kammani rūpaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:273_4: Sāsane pana avisesato ‘‘paccate’’ti vā ‘‘paccatī’’ti vā vuttassapi padassa akammakoyeva divādigaṇiko payogo icchitabbo ‘‘devadatto niraye paccati.
anya-e0804n0:273_6: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīyantiādi viya bhūvādigaṇapakkhiko kammakattuppayogo esa,
anya-e0804n0:273_7: tasmā ‘sayamevā’ti padaṁ ajjhāharitvā ‘sayameva devadatto paccatī’tiādinā attho vattabbo’’ti tanna,
anya-e0804n0:273_8: ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti ettha hi pānīyaṁ manussā pivanti, na pānīyaṁ pānīyaṁ pivati. Manusseheva taṁ pīyate, na sayaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:273_9: Evaṁ parassa pānakriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtampi taṁ sukarapānakriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhantaṁ viya hotīti ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n0:274_0: ‘‘Sayameva kaṭo kariyate’’ti etthāpi kaṭaṁ manussā karonti, na kaṭaṁ kaṭo karoti. Manusseheva kaṭo kariyate, na sayaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:274_1: Evaṁ parassa karaṇakriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtopi so sukaraṇa kriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhanto viya hotīti ‘‘sayameva kaṭo kariyate’’ti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n0:275_0: Ettha yathā sayaṁsaddo pānīyaṁ pānīyeneva pīyate, na amhehi. Kaṭo kaṭeneva kariyate,
anya-e0804n0:275_1: na amhehīti sakammakavisayattā payogānaṁ aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanasaṅkhātaṁ atthavisesaṁ vadati,
anya-e0804n0:275_3: kammaṁ paccatī’’tiādīsu tumhehi ajjhāharito sayaṁsaddo atthavisesaṁ vadati akammakavisayattā etesaṁ payogānaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:275_4: Evaṁ ‘‘devadatto’’tiādikassa paccattavacanassa akammakakattuvācakattā kammarahitasuddhakattuvācakattā ca ‘‘paccatī’’ti idaṁ divādigaṇikarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:275_5: Pacadhātu saddasatthe divādigaṇa vutto natthīti ce? Natthi vā atthi vā,
anya-e0804n0:275_6: kimettha saddasatthaṁ karissati, pāḷi eva pamāṇaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:275_7: tasmā mayaṁ lokavohārakusalassa bhagavato pāḷinayaññeva gahetvā imaṁ pacadhātuṁ divādigaṇepi pakkhipissāma.
anya-e0804n0:275_8: Tathā hi dhammapālācariya anuruddhācariyādīhi abhisaṅkhatā divādigaṇikappayogā dissanti –-
anya-e0804n0:277_0: Pacchā paccati pākānaṁ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
anya-e0804n0:279_1: Ettha pana tesaṁ idameva pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0804n0:279_2: Ye curādigaṇamhi sakammakabhāvena bhūvādigaṇe ca akammakabhāvena pavattassa bhūdhātusseva bhūvādigaṇe pavattassa sakamakassapi sato divādigaṇaṁ patvā akammakabhūtassa pacadhātussa sakammakattamicchanti.
anya-e0804n0:279_3: Etañhi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā,
anya-e0804n0:279_4: tasmā bhagavato pāvacane sotūnaṁ saṁsayasamugghāṭatthaṁ ettha imaṁ nītiṁ paṭṭhapema –
anya-e0804n0:282_0: Puriso odanaṁ pacati. Sa bhūtapacaniṁ paci. Odano paccati. Kammaṁ paccati. Vīhisīsaṁ paccati. Rukkhaphalāni paccanti. Nāgo pākāraṁ bhindati. Taḷākapāḷi bhijjati. Bhijjanadhammaṁ bhijjati.
anya-e0804n0:282_1: Ettha ca sayaṁsaddaṁ ajjhāharitvā ‘‘sayameva odano paccatī’’tiādinā vuttepi ‘‘puriso sayameva pāṇaṁ hanati.
anya-e0804n0:282_2: Bhagavā sayameva ñeyyadhammaṁ abujjhī’’ti payogesu parassa āṇattisambhūtahananakriyāpaṭisedhamiva paropadesasambhūtabujjhanakriyāpaṭisedhanamiva ca aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanavasena vuttattā yo sayaṁsaddavasena kammakattubhāvaparikappo, taṁ na pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:285_0: Kāmaguṇehi dibbati. Paccāmitte dibbati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:287_0: Payogato sakammā ca, akammā ca gamādayo.
anya-e0804n0:288_1: Gambhīresupi atthesu ñāṇaṁ gacchati. Dhammaṁ carati. Tattha tattha carati.
anya-e0804n0:291_1: pāsādaṁ dakkhati pāsādo dissati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:294_0: Mataṁ vā amma rodanti, idha nandati pecca nandati.
anya-e0804n0:299_0: Puriso gāmā niggacchati, dhanaṁ adhigacchati, puriso pāṇaṁ abhibhavati,
anya-e0804n0:300_0: Tattha yadi sāsane pacadhātussa kammani rūpaṁ siyā,
anya-e0804n0:300_1: ‘‘purisena kammaṁ kariyatī’’ti payogo viya ‘‘purisena odano paciyatī’’ti payogo icchitabbo.
anya-e0804n0:300_2: Ye pana garū ‘‘tayā paccate odano’’tiādīni icchanti,
anya-e0804n0:300_4: Evaṁ santepi upaparikkhitvā yuttāni ce, gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:300_5: Kārite ‘‘puriso purisena purisaṁ vā odanaṁ pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.
anya-e0804n0:300_6: Purisena puriso odanaṁ pāciyati, pācayiyati, pācāpiyati,
anya-e0804n0:300_8: gāvaṁ pāceti gocara’’ntiādīsu aññopi attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:301_0: Pacaṁ, pacanto, pacantī, pacamāno, pacamānā. Pātabbaṁ, pacitaṁ, pacitabbaṁ, pacanīyaṁ, pacituṁ, pacitvā.
anya-e0804n0:301_1: Ettha ca ‘‘imassa maṁsañca pātabba’’nti payogo udāharaṇaṁ. ‘‘Pacati, pacanti.
anya-e0804n0:306_0: Paraṁ na byākarissaṁ so, sāsane īrito na hi.
anya-e0804n0:307_1: Chotvāna moḷiṁ varagandhavāsitaṁ. Acchocchuṁvata bho rukkhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:308_1: Paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti milakkhūsu aviññātāresu.
anya-e0804n0:310_1: Dīghaṁ vā añchanto dīghaṁ añchāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0804n0:312_0: Muccha mohamucchāsu. Mucchati. Mucchito visavegena, visaññī samapajjatha. Mucchā, mucchitvā.
anya-e0804n0:315_0: Uchi uñche. Uñcho pariyesanaṁ. Uñchati. Uñchācariyāya īhatha.
anya-e0804n0:317_0: Puccha pañhe pucchati. Pucchitā, pucchako, puṭṭho, pucchito, pucchā.
anya-e0804n0:317_1: Bhikkhu vinayadharaṁ pañhaṁ pucchati. Pucchi, pucchituṁ. Pucchitvā.
anya-e0804n0:317_2: Ettha ca pañcavidhā pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṁsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
anya-e0804n0:319_0: Vacchuchedane. Vucchati. Vuttā, vuttavā, vuttasiro. Vakāragatassa akārassa uttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:320_0: Vuttasaddo kesoharaṇepi dissati ‘‘kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro’’tiādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:320_1: Ettha ca sirasaddena siroruhā vuttā yathā mañcasaddena mañcaṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n0:322_0: Kesohāre ropite ca, kathite ca yathākkamanti.
anya-e0804n0:323_0: Aparo nayo – vuttasaddo ‘‘no ca kho paṭivutta’’ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati.
anya-e0804n0:323_4: Loke pana ‘‘vutto pārāyano’’tiādīsu ajjhene dissati, atridaṁ vuccati
anya-e0804n0:327_0: Aparopi nayo – vuttasaddo saupasaggoca anupasaggo ca vapane vāpasamīkaraṇe kesohāre jīvitavuttiyaṁ pamuttabhāve pāvacanavasena pavattite ajjhene kathaneti evamādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa –
anya-e0804n0:329_0: Vuttānaṁ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṁ na dubbhatī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:330_4: ‘‘Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāyā’’tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve.
anya-e0804n0:330_5: ‘‘Yesamidaṁ etarahi porāṇaṁ mantapadaṁ gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samīhita’’ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. Loke pana ‘‘vutto gaṇo,
anya-e0804n0:335_0: Pavattite ca ajjhene, kathane cāti lakkhaye;
anya-e0804n0:339_1: Dhammaṁ caranto sāmikaṁ parājeti. Dhammaṁ caranto parajjati. Rājānaṁ jayāpesuṁ. Jayāpetvā.
anya-e0804n0:339_2: Ettha jayāpesunti ‘‘jayatu bhava’’nti āsīsavacanaṁ vadiṁsūti attho. Jayanaṁ, jitaṁ, jayo, vijitaṁ, jino, jetā, jeto, jito māro, māraṁ jito, jitavā, jitāvī, vijitāvī, māraji, lokaji, odhijino, anodhijino, jito. Vijito, jetuṁ, vijetuṁ, jitvā, vijitvā.
anya-e0804n0:339_3: Imassa pana dhātussa kiyādigaṇaṁ pattassa ‘‘jināti jinitvā’’tyādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:340_0: Ji abhibhavane. Jeti. Jino. Pubbe viya rūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:341_0: Ju gatiyaṁ. Ettha sīghagati adhippetā. Javati. Javanaṁ, javo, javaṁ, javanto, javanacittaṁ, javanapañño, javanahaṁso. Manojavaṁ gacchati yenakāmaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:342_1: Sāsanānurūpena ‘‘kiṁ maṁ dhanena jīyethā’’ti hi pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:345_0: Vaja gatiyaṁ. Dhaja dhaji ca. Vajati. Abbajati. Manussattañca abbaje. Vajo, vajanaṁ, pavajanaṁ, pabbajjā, pabbajito, pabbājito.
anya-e0804n0:346_0: Sakā raṭṭhā pabbājito, aññaṁ janapadaṁ gato;
anya-e0804n0:348_0: Dhajati. Dhajo. Dhañjati. Dhañjanaṁ. Ettha dhajoti ketu. Dhañjananti gamanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:349_0: Aja khepane ca. Gatiapekkhakoyeva cakāro. Ajati. Ajo. Ettha ajoti eḷako.
anya-e0804n0:349_1: Imāni panassa pariyāyavacanāni ‘‘ajo eḷako urabbho avi meṇḍo’’ti. Tattha urabbhoti eḷako, yo ‘‘ajo’’tipi vuccati. Avīti rattalomo eḷako. Meṇḍoti kuṭilasiṅgo eḷako.
anya-e0804n0:349_2: Tathā hi janakajātake ajarathato meṇḍarathā visuṁ vuttā.
anya-e0804n0:349_3: Apica ajeḷakanti ajato eḷakassa visuṁ vacanato eḷakasaddena meṇḍopi gahetabbo,
anya-e0804n0:350_0: Ajja sajja ajjane. Ajjanaṁ ajjanakriyā. Ajjati. Sajjati.
anya-e0804n0:352_0: Khajja majjane ca. Majjanaṁ suddhi. Byathanāpekkho cakāro. Khajjati. Khajjūro.
anya-e0804n0:354_0: Khaji gativekalle. Kissa bhante ayyo khañjatīti. Ubho khañjā. Khañjanaṁ, khañjituṁ, khañjitvā.
anya-e0804n0:355_1: Ettha ca ejāti lābhādiṁ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā, balavataṇhāyetaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:357_0: Khijakuji guji abyattasadde. Khijati. Kuñjati. Guñjati.
anya-e0804n0:358_0: Laja lāja tajja bhassane. Lajati. Lājati. Tajjati.
anya-e0804n0:359_0: Laji dittiyañca. Bhassanāpekkho cakāro. Lañjati. Tatiyo nayalañjako.
anya-e0804n0:360_0: Jaja jaji yuddhe. Yujjhanaṁ yuddhaṁ. Jajati. Jañjati.
anya-e0804n0:362_0: Tuji balane ca. Balanaṁ balanakriyā. Hiṁsāpekkhako cakāro. Tuñjati.
anya-e0804n0:363_0: Gaja kuji muji gajja saddatthā. Gajati. Kuñjati. Muñjati. Gajo gajjati, megho gajjati. Yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gajjati. Maṇi gajjati. Ñāṇagajjanaṁ gajjati. Gajjituṁ samattho. Gajjitā. Gajjitvā. Tattha gajoti hatthī. Hatthissa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:364_0: Hatthī nāgo gajo dantī, kuñjaro vāraṇo karī;
anya-e0804n0:366_0: Thambho rammo dvipo ceva, hatthinī tu kareṇukā;
anya-e0804n0:367_0: Hatthipoto hatthicchāpo, bhiṅko ca kalabho bhave.
anya-e0804n0:368_0: Caja cāge. Cajati. Pariccajati. Cāgo. Pariccāgo. Cajanaṁ. Cajaṁ, cajanto. Cajamāno.
anya-e0804n0:369_0: Sanja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṁ. Sañcati. Satto. Sajanaṁ, satti. Āsatti. Sajituṁ. Sajitvā.
anya-e0804n0:371_0: Bhaji bhajjane. Bhajjanaṁ tāpakaraṇaṁ. Tilāni bhajjati. Purisena bhajjamānāni tilāni.
anya-e0804n0:372_0: Ejabheja bhāja dittiyaṁ. Ditti sobhā. Ejati. Bhejati. Bhājati.
anya-e0804n0:373_0: Tija nisāne, khamāyañca. Nisānaṁ tikkhatākaraṇaṁ. Khamā khanti. Tejati. Titikkhati. Tejano. Tejo.
anya-e0804n0:373_1: Tattha tejanoti kaṇḍo saro usu. Tejoti sūriyo.
anya-e0804n0:373_2: Atha vā tejoti tejanaṁ usmā uṇhattaṁ tāpo. Tejoti vā ānubhāvo pabhāvo.
anya-e0804n0:376_0: Rāja dittiyaṁ bhāja ca. Rājati. Bhājati. Rājā. Rājinī. Vanarāji. Rājitvā. Virājitvā.
anya-e0804n0:378_0: Ne’tassa iti vatvāna, dve janā kalahaṁ karuṁ.
anya-e0804n0:379_0: Ettha ca paṭhamapādassa dutiyapade ‘‘me ahi mahī’’ti chedo ‘‘puttā me atthi puttā matthī’’ti viya.
anya-e0804n0:379_1: ‘‘Mahi arāja mahārājā’’ti ca chedo ‘‘yopi ayaṁ yopāya’’nti viya.
anya-e0804n0:379_2: Ettha arājasaddo ‘‘atikaramakarācariyā’’ti ettha akarīti atthavācako akarasaddo viya ākhyātaparokkhāvibhattiko daṭṭhabbo. Arāja virocīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:379_3: Ayaṁ pana gāthāya piṇḍattho ‘‘mahārāja me ahi arāja, mama eva ahi arāja,
anya-e0804n0:379_4: na etassa iti vatvā dve ahituṇḍikajanā kalahaṁ kariṁsū’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:380_0: Ranja rāge. Bhikkhu cīvaraṁ rajati. Satto rūpādīsu rañjati. Rajanaṁ. Rajako. Rāgo. Virāgo. Haliddirāgo. Rājā. Rājinī.
anya-e0804n0:380_1: Imassa ca divādigaṇaṁ pattassa ‘‘rajjati virajjatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:380_3: Rajakoti rajakāro vatthadhovanako. Rāgoti rajjanti sattā tena, sayaṁ vā rañjati,
anya-e0804n0:380_4: rañjanamattameva vā etanti rāgo, taṇhā. Imāni pana tadabhidhānāni –
anya-e0804n0:381_0: Rāgo lobho tasiṇā ca, taṇhā ejā visattikā;
anya-e0804n0:382_0: Satti āsatti mucchā ca, lubbhitattañca lubbhanā.
anya-e0804n0:383_0: Kāmo nikāmanā icchā, nikanti ca niyanti ca;
anya-e0804n0:384_0: Vanañca vanatho ceva, apekkhā bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0804n0:385_0: Anurodho ca sārāgo, saṅgo paṅko ca sibbinī;
anya-e0804n0:388_3: Dānañca piyavacanañca atthacariyā ca samānattatā cāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi attani mahājanaṁ rañjetītipi rājā. Rājinīti rājabhariyā.
anya-e0804n0:389_0: Rājā bhūpati devo ca, manujindo disampati;
anya-e0804n0:400_0: Bhaja sevāyaṁ. Bhajati. Bhajanā. Sambhajanā. Bhatti. Sambhatti. Bhattā.
anya-e0804n0:401_4: bhavo vā yattha labbhatī’’ti gāthāyaṁ saṅgatasaddena samodhānaṁ vuttaṁ. Dānaṁ pariccāgo. Dhammo jhānasīlādi.
anya-e0804n0:401_5: Etesvatthesu yajadhātu vattati. Pupphehi buddhaṁ yajati. Devataṁ yajati.
anya-e0804n0:401_6: Devamanussehi bhagavā yajiyati. Ijjati. Yiṭṭhaṁ. Yañño. Yāgo. Dhammayāgo. Yajamāno sake pure. Yiṭṭhuṁ, yajituṁ. Puthuyaññaṁ yajitvāna.
anya-e0804n0:402_0: Majja saṁsuddhiyaṁ. Majjati. Bāhiraṁ parimajjati. Bhūmiṁ sammajjati. Majjanaṁ. Sammajjanī.
anya-e0804n0:403_0: Niñji suddhiyaṁ. Niñjati. Paniñjati. Niñjituṁ. Paniñjituṁ. Niñjitvā. Paniñjitvā.
anya-e0804n0:403_1: Ayaṁ pana pāḷi ‘‘tato tvaṁ moggallāna uṭṭhāyāsanā udakena akkhīni paniñjitvā disā anulokeyyāsī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:405_0: Bhaja pāke. Tilāni bhajjati. Bhajjamānā tilāni ca.
anya-e0804n0:406_0: Uju ajjave. Ajjavaṁ ujubhāvo. Ojati. Uju.
anya-e0804n0:408_2: Rogoti rujati bhañjati aṅgapaccaṅgānīti rogo, byādhiyeva,
anya-e0804n0:409_0: Bhuja koṭille. Āvipubbo aññatthesu ca. Urago bhujati. Ābhujati. Bhikkhu pallaṅkaṁ ābhujati,
anya-e0804n0:409_1: ūrubaddhāsanaṁ bandhatīti attho. Mahāsamuddo ābhujati, āvaṭṭatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:409_2: Keci pana ‘‘osakkatī’’ti atthaṁ vadanti. ‘‘Vaṇṇadāna’’nti ābhujati, manasi karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:409_4: Ettha ca vibhujatīti chindati. Bhogo. Bhogī. Ābhogo. Ābhujitvā.
anya-e0804n0:409_5: Ettha ca bhogoti bhujayati kuṭilaṁ kariyatīti bhogo, ahisarīraṁ. Bhogīti sappo.
anya-e0804n0:410_0: Raji vijjhane. Nāgo dantehi bhūmiṁ rañjati. Ārañjati.
anya-e0804n0:410_2: Tassattho ‘‘idaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ tathāgatagandhahatthino mahāvajirañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇadantehi rañjitaṁ ārañjitaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:410_4: Rañjitanti hi rañjati vijjhati etthāti ruñjitaṁ, rañjanaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:410_5: ‘‘Idaṁ nesaṁ padakkanta’’ntiādimhi viya etassa saddassa siddhi veditabbā adhikaraṇatthasambhavato.
anya-e0804n0:411_1: tenassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na santi. Vejati. Vego. Dhammasaṁvego. Saṁvigo vegena palāyi. Nadīvego. Ūmivego , vātavego.
anya-e0804n0:411_2: Ettha dhammasaṁvegoti sahottappaṁ ñāṇaṁ. ‘‘Vego, javo, rayo’’ti ime ekatthā.
anya-e0804n0:411_3: Divādigaṇaṁ pana pattassa ‘‘vijjati saṁvijjati ubbijjatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti dvigaṇikattā.
anya-e0804n0:412_0: Lajja lajjane. Lajjati. Lajjā. Lajjāti hirī. Yā ‘‘viriḷanā’’tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:414_0: Kujja adhomukhīkaraṇe. Kujjati. Nikujjati. Ukkujjati. Paṭikujjati. Nikujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya. Aññissā pātiyā paṭikujjati. Avakujjo nipajjahaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:414_1: Tattha kujjati nikujjatīti imāni ‘‘carati vicaratī’’ti padāni viya samānatthāni, adhomukhaṁ karotīti hi attho.
anya-e0804n0:415_0: Mujja osīdane. Mujjati. Nimujjati. Nimuggo. Ummuggo.
anya-e0804n0:419_0: Jhe cintāyaṁ. Jhāyati, nijjhāyati, upanijjhāyati, ujjhāyati, sajjhāyati. Jhānaṁ, nijjhānaṁ, upanijjhānaṁ, ujjhāyanaṁ, sajjhāyanaṁ. Nijjhatti. Upajjhā, upajjhāyo. Jhāyī, ajjhāyako.
anya-e0804n0:420_5: Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena vā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena vā jhāyanasīlo cintanasīlo. Jhāyī jhānavāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:420_7: na dānime jhāyantīti kho vāseṭṭha ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakātveva tatiyaṁ akkharaṁ upanibbatta’’nti evaṁ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ garahavacanaṁ uppannaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:420_9: mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṁsāvacanaṁ katvā voharantīti.
anya-e0804n0:420_10: Ayaṁ panattho ‘‘adhipubbassa i ajjhayane’’ti dhātussa vasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:420_11: Evaṁ adhipubbassa idhātussa vasena imassa dhātussa atthaparivattanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:421_0: Jhe dittiyaṁ. Dīpo jhāyati, dārūni jhāyanti. Ettha jhāyatīti jalati.
anya-e0804n0:423_0: Ujjha ussagge. Ussaggo chaḍḍanaṁ. Ujjhati. Ujjhitaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:426_0: Ñā avabodhane. ‘‘Ñāti, ñanti, ñāsi. Ñātu, ñantu. Ñeyya,
anya-e0804n0:426_1: ñeyyu’’ntiādīni yathāpāvacanaṁ gahetabbāni. Ñāti, ñātako, añño, ñattaṁ, ñatti, paññatti, viññatti, saññatti, saññā, saññāṇaṁ, paññā, paññāṇaṁ, ñāṇaṁ, viññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:427_0: Tattha ñātīti jānāti. Puna ñātīti bandhu.
anya-e0804n0:427_1: So hi ‘‘ayaṁ amhāka’’nti ñātabbaṭṭhena ñātīti. Evaṁ ñātako.
anya-e0804n0:427_2: Aññoti diṭṭhadhammikādayo atthe na ñāti na jānātīti añño, avidvā bāloti attho. Ñattanti jānanabhāvo. ‘‘Yāvadeva anatthāya,
anya-e0804n0:427_3: ñattaṁ bālassa jāyatī’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Saññāṇanti cihanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:427_6: Attatthaṁ vā paratthaṁ vā ñassati. Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ. Ekacce nabbhaññaṁsu,
anya-e0804n0:427_8: tasmā ñātītiādīni ākhyātikapadāni diṭṭhāniyeva honti nayavasena.
anya-e0804n0:427_9: Tathā hi aññātīti ettha āiti upasaggo,
anya-e0804n0:427_10: so parassakkharassa saññoguccāraṇicchāya rassaṁ katvā niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0804n0:427_11: Ñātīti sāsane ākhyātikapadaṁ diṭṭhaṁ, tasmāyeva ‘‘ñāti, ñanti.
anya-e0804n0:428_1: Māraṇaṁ jīvitindriyupacchedakaraṇaṁ. Tosanaṁ tuṭṭhi. Nisānaṁ tikkhatā. Ñatti. Manuññaṁ. Paññatti.
anya-e0804n0:429_0: Ettha ñattīti māretīti vā tosetīti vā nisetīti vā attho.
anya-e0804n0:429_1: Ayañca ñattisaddo ‘‘vatti etāyāti vācā’’ti ettha vattisaddo viya ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:429_2: Tathā ādatteti ettha vibhattibhūtassa tesaddassa viya vibhattibhūtassa tisaddassa saññogabhāvo ca dhātuantassarassa rassattañca.
anya-e0804n0:429_3: Manuññanti manaṁ ābhuso ñeti tosetīti manuññaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:429_4: Ayamattho manasaddūpapadassa āpubbassimassa ñādhātussa vasena daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:429_5: Paññattīti nānappakārato pavattinivāraṇena akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ñatti māraṇaṁ paññatti.
anya-e0804n0:429_6: Atha vā dhammaṁ suṇantānaṁ dhammadesanāya citte anekavidhena somanassuppādanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:429_8: tathā sotūnaṁ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca paññāpanaṁ paññattīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:439_0: Laṭa bālye ca. Pubbāpekkhāya cakāro. Laṭati. Lāṭo.
anya-e0804n0:440_0: Saṭa rujāvisaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Rujā pīḷā. Visaraṇaṁ vippharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:440_1: Gatyāvasānaṁ gatiyā avasānaṁ osānaṁ abhāvakaraṇaṁ, nisīdananti vuttaṁ hoti. Saṭati. Sāṭo vuccati sāṭako.
anya-e0804n0:442_0: Khiṭa uttāsane. Kheṭati, ākheṭako, kheṭo, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito.
anya-e0804n0:444_0: Jaṭaghaṭa saṅghāte. Jaṭati. Jaṭā, jaṭilo, jaṭī. Antojaṭā bahijaṭā, jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā.
anya-e0804n0:445_0: Bhaṭa bhattiyaṁ. Bhaṭati. Bhaṭo. Vetanaṁ bhaṭako yathā.
anya-e0804n0:446_0: Taṭa ussaye. Ussayo āroho ubbedho. Taṭati. Taṭo, giritaṭo, nadītaṭo, taṭī, taṭaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:449_2: ‘‘Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakaṁ ādāyā’’tiādīsu yasmiṁ kismiñci bhājane.
anya-e0804n0:455_0: Aṭa paṭa iṭa kiṭa kaṭa gatiyaṁ. Aṭati. Paṭati. Eṭati. Keṭati. Kaṭati.
anya-e0804n0:455_2: Paṭati jiṇṇabhāvaṁ gacchatīti paṭo. Paṭoti vatthaṁ. Vatthassa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:456_0: Paṭo coḷo sāṭako ca, vāso vasanamaṁsukaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:461_0: Ruṭi luṭi theyye. Ruṇṭati. Luṇṭati. Ruṇṭako. Luṇṭako.
anya-e0804n0:466_0: Ghaṭa cetāyaṁ. Ghaṭati. Ghaṭo. Ghaṭo vuccati kumbho. Imāni tadabhidhānāni –
anya-e0804n0:467_0: Ghaṭo kumbho ghaṭī kumbhī, tuṇḍikiro tu ukkhalī;
anya-e0804n0:469_0: Caṭa bhaṭa paribhāsane deṭa ca. Caṭati. Bhaṭati. Deṭati.
anya-e0804n0:472_0: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭa chedane. Cuṭati. Chuṭati. Kuṭati.
anya-e0804n0:479_1: Gatinivatti uppajjamānassa gamanassupacchedo. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti. Tiṭṭhati. Patiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭheti. Saṇṭhāti. Saṇṭhahati. Adhiṭṭhahati. Upaṭṭhahati. Ṭhātu. Tiṭṭhatu. Tiṭṭheyya. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhu. Aṭṭhā, aṭṭhū, aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṁsu. Yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati. Tiṭṭhissati. Upassuti tiṭṭhissatha. Aṭṭhissā, aṭṭhissaṁsu. Atiṭṭhissā, atiṭṭhissaṁsu. Ṭhātuṁ, upaṭṭhātuṁ. Upaṭṭhahituṁ. Adhiṭṭhātuṁ. Adhiṭṭhahituṁ. Ṭhatvā, adhiṭṭhitvā. Upaṭṭhahitvā, adhiṭṭhahitvā. Ṭhānaṁ, ṭhiti, saṇṭhiti, avaṭṭhiti. Saṇṭhānaṁ, paṭṭhānaṁ. Upaṭṭhāko, ṭhito. Pabbataṭṭho bhūmaṭṭho. Upaṭṭhahaṁ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:480_1: ‘‘Kiṁ panāyasmā devānamindo kammaṁ katvā imaṁ ṭhānaṁ patto’’tiādīsu hi issariye dissati.
anya-e0804n0:480_5: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṁ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena, tasmā ṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:485_0: Paṭhaviyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Dhammaṁ paṭhati. Pāṭho, nakkhattapāṭhako, so horapāṭhakaṁ pucchi. Sabbapāṭhī bhavissati. Paṭhituṁ, paṭhitave, paṭhitvā, paṭhitvāna, paṭhituna, paṭhiya, paṭhiyāna.
anya-e0804n0:486_0: Evaṁvidhaṁ tuṁpaccayantādivibhāgaṁ sabbattha yathārahaṁ vattukāmāpi gantha vitthārabhayena na vadāma.
anya-e0804n0:486_1: Avuttopi īdiso vibhāgo nayānusārena yathāsambhavaṁ sabbattha yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:486_2: Yattha pana pāḷinidassanādiviseso icchitabbo hoti, tatthevetaṁ dassessāma.
anya-e0804n0:487_3: thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṁ bhikkhūti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:491_1: Balakkāro nāma attano balena yathājjhāsayaṁ dabbalassa abhibhavanaṁ. Sāṭhati. Sāṭho.
anya-e0804n0:492_0: Uṭha ruṭha luṭha upaghāte. Oṭhati. Roṭhati. Loṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:494_0: Saṭha ketave ca. Pubbatthesu cakāro. Saṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:496_0: Kuṭhi luṭhi ālassiye ca. Cakāro pubbatthe ca. Kuṇṭhati. Kuṇṭho. Luṇṭhati. Luṇṭho.
anya-e0804n0:498_0: Ruṭhi luṭhi aṭhi gatiyaṁ. Ruṇṭhati. Luṇṭhati. Aṇṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:499_0: Veṭha veṭhane. Veṭhati, nibbeṭhati. Veṭhanaṁ, nibbeṭhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:502_0: Eṭha heṭha vibādhāyaṁ. Eṭhati. Heṭhati. Viheṭhati. Viheṭhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:508_0: Ḍi vihāyasagatiyaṁ gamanamatte ca. Ḍeti, ḍayati. Ḍemāno. Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna. Ye maṁ pure paccuḍḍenti.
anya-e0804n0:510_0: Ito bahiddhā pāsaṇḍā, diṭṭhīsu pasīdanti te;
anya-e0804n0:511_0: Na tesaṁ dhammaṁ rocemi, na te dhammassa kovidā.
anya-e0804n0:512_0: Ettha ca pāsaṇḍāti pāsaṁ ḍentīti pāsaṇḍā,
anya-e0804n0:512_2: Atha vā taṇhāpāsaṁ diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti uḍḍentīti pāsaṇḍā.
anya-e0804n0:517_0: Huḍi piḍi saṅghāte. Huṇḍati. Piṇḍati. Piṇḍo.
anya-e0804n0:520_0: Vaḍi maḍi veṭhane. Vaṇḍati. Maṇḍati. Maṇḍalaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:523_0: Tuḍi toḷane. Tuṇḍati. Tuṇḍo. Tuṇḍenādāya gaccheyya.
anya-e0804n0:525_0: Caḍi kope. Caṇḍati. Caṇḍo. Caṇḍālo, caṇḍikkaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:528_0: Paḍi gatiyaṁ. Paṇḍati. Paṇḍā, paṇḍito. Ettha paṇḍāti paññā.
anya-e0804n0:528_1: Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu paṇḍati gacchati dukkhādīnaṁ pīḷanādikampi ākāraṁ jānātīti ‘‘paṇḍā’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:528_2: Paṇḍitoti paṇḍāya ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n0:528_3: Atha vā sañjātā paṇḍā etassāti paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n0:534_0: Vaḍḍha vaḍḍhane. Vaḍḍhati. Sirivaḍḍhako, dhanavaḍḍhako, vaḍḍhito, buḍḍho. Ettha ca vakārassa bakāro, akārassa cukāro.
anya-e0804n0:535_0: Kaḍḍha ākaḍḍhane. Kaḍḍhati, ākaḍḍhati, nikaḍḍhati. Akāmā parikaḍḍhanti, ulūkaññeva vāyasā.
anya-e0804n0:538_0: Aṇa raṇa vaṇa bhaṇa maṇa kaṇa sadde. Aṇati. Aṇako brāhmaṇo. Raṇati. Raṇaṁ. Vaṇati. Vāṇako. Bhaṇati. Bhāṇako. Maṇati. Maṇiko. Kaṇati. Kāṇo.
anya-e0804n0:538_1: Tattha brāhmaṇoti brahmaṁ aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:539_0: Brāhmaṇo sottiyo vippo, bhovādī brahmabandhu ca;
anya-e0804n0:541_0: Raṇasaddo ‘‘saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammā’’tiādīsu kilesesu vattati.
anya-e0804n0:541_1: Kilesā hi raṇanti kandanti etehīti raṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:544_1: Raṇaṁ katvāti hi yuddhaṁ katvāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:544_3: dhāviṁsu te aṭṭhadisā samantato’’ti ettha cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe vattati.
anya-e0804n0:544_4: Raṇaṁ karontāti hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṁ karontāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:544_5: Evaṁ atthavivaraṇampi saddasaṅkhātamatthaṁ antoyeva katvā adhippāyatthavasena kataṁ,
anya-e0804n0:545_0: Bhaṇa bhaṇane. Parittaṁ bhaṇati, vacanaṁ bhaṇati. Dīghabhāṇako, piyabhāṇī, bhāṇavāro. Ettha bhāṇavāroti –
anya-e0804n0:554_0: Ghiṇi ghuṇi ghaṇi gahaṇe. Ghiṇṇati. Ghuṇṇati. Ghaṇṇati.
anya-e0804n0:556_0: Paṇa byavahāre, thutiyañca. Paṇati vāṇijo, vohāraṁ karoti iccattho. Saddho buddhaṁ paṇati, thomayati iccattho, āpaṇaṁ, sāpaṇo gāmo.
anya-e0804n0:561_0: Pīṇa pīṇane. Pīṇanaṁ paripuṇṇatā. Pīṇati. Pīṇo divā na bhuñjati, pīṇorakkhaṁsabāhu.
anya-e0804n0:564_0: Saṇa abyattasadde. Saṇati. Saṇateva brahmāraññaṁ. Saṇatevāti nadati viya.
anya-e0804n0:566_1: Ettha ca nipuṇasaṇhasukhumasaddā vevacanasaddā kusalachekadakkhasaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:571_0: Phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca. Phuṇati. Aṅgārakāsuṁ apare phuṇanti.
anya-e0804n0:577_0: Te pālane. Pālanaṁ rakkhaṇaṁ. Tāyati. Tāṇaṁ, gottaṁ, nakkhattaṁ. Aghassa tātā. Kicchenādhigatā bhogā, te tāto vidhami dhamaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:577_2: ‘‘Gotamo kassapo’’ti hi ādinā pavattamānaṁ gaṁ vacanaṁ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṁsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:577_3: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
anya-e0804n0:577_5: tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. Ko pana soti?
anya-e0804n0:577_6: Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṁ tassa kulassa ādipurisasammuditaṁ taṁkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṁ sāmaññarūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:578_0: Nakkhattanti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:578_2: Tathā hi assayujo bharaṇī kattikā rohaṇī migasiro addā punabbasu phusso assaliso māgho pubbaphagguṇī uttaraphagguṇī hattho cittaṁ svāti visākhā anurādhā jeṭṭhā mūlaṁ pubbāsaḷhaṁ uttarāsaḷhaṁ sāvaṇaṁ dhanasiṭṭhā satabhisattaṁ pubbabhaddapadaṁ uttarabhaddapadaṁ revatī cāti sattavīsati nakkhattāni.
anya-e0804n0:578_3: Tāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṁ īsakampi na vijahanti kiñci sīghaṁ kiñci dandhaṁ, kadāci sīghaṁ, kadāci dandhaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:578_4: etto ito cāti evaṁ visamagatiyā agantvā yantacakke paṭipāṭiyā yojitāni viya samappamāṇagatiyā attano vīthiyāva gacchantāni maṇḍalākārena sineruṁ parivattanti.
anya-e0804n0:578_5: Evaṁ imāni nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyanti rakkhantīti nakkhattānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:578_6: Porāṇā pana kharadhātuvasena ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī’’ti āvocuṁ,
anya-e0804n0:578_7: ‘‘nakkhattaṁ joti rikkhaṁ taṁ’’ iccetāni nakkhattatārakānaṁ nāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:578_8: ‘‘Uḷu tārā tārakā’’ti imāni pana sabbāsampi tārakānaṁ sādhāraṇanāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:579_1: Saññāṇaṁ cihanaṁ lakkhaṇakaraṇaṁ. Cetati. Cihanaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:579_2: Īkārantavasena vuttattā asmā dhātuto saki saṅkāyanti dhātuto viya niggahītāgamo na hoti.
anya-e0804n0:580_0: Pata gatiyaṁ. Patati. Papatati papātaṁ, papateyyahaṁ. Pāpattaṁ nirayaṁ bhusaṁ. Ahaṁsaddena yojetabbaṁ, pāpattaṁ papatitosmīti attho. Pāpattha nirayaṁ bhusaṁ, sokumāroti yojetabbaṁ, pāpattha papatitoti attho. Parokkhāpadañhietaṁ dvayaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:580_1: ‘‘Pāvadaṁ pāvadā’’tiādīsu viya upasaggapadassa dīghabhāvo, tato aṁsaddassa ttaṁādeso,
anya-e0804n0:580_2: asaddassa ca tthādeso bhavati. Acinteyyo hi pāḷinayo.
anya-e0804n0:581_3: tasmā bhavābhavaṁ dhāvanto jātijarābyādhimaraṇādibhedaṁ anekavihitaṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ atati satataṁ gacchati pāpuṇāti adhigacchatīti attātipi nibbacanamicchitabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:581_5: attabhāvo’’ti ca ‘‘sukhadukkhaṁ adati anubhavatīti attā’’ti ca ‘‘attamanoti pītisomanassena gahitamano’’ti ca attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0804n0:581_6: yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati,
anya-e0804n0:581_7: tattha tattha tathā tathā atthassa gahetabbatoti.
anya-e0804n0:583_2: Idha anta saddassa atthuddhāro vuccate ‘‘antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariya’’nti ettha dvattiṁsākārantogadhaṁ kuṇapantaṁ antaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n0:583_4: Haritantaṁ vā’’ti ettha antimamariyādanto anto nāma.
anya-e0804n0:586_0: Kita nivāse rogāpanayane ca. Ketati. Sāketaṁ na garaṁ, niketo, niketaṁ pāvisi.
anya-e0804n0:586_1: Āmodamāno gacchati sanniketaṁ. Tikicchati, cikicchati, cikicchā, cikicchako.
anya-e0804n0:586_2: Tattha sāketanti sāyaṁ gahitavasanaṭṭhānattā sāketaṁ, yaṁsaddalopo.
anya-e0804n0:587_0: Yata patiyatane. Patiyatanaṁ vāyāmakaraṇaṁ. Yatati. Yati, yatavā, payatanaṁ, āyatanaṁ, lokāyataṁ.
anya-e0804n0:587_2: Etāni hi taṁdvārārammaṇacittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti etesūti ‘‘āyatanānī’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:587_3: Ettha pana nītanudhātūnaṁ vasenapi āyatanasaddattho vattabbo siyā, so uttari āvibhavissati.
anya-e0804n0:588_0: Āyatanasaddo nivāsaṭṭhāne ākare samosaraṇaṭṭhāne sañjātidese kāraṇe ca.
anya-e0804n0:588_1: Tathā hi ‘‘loke issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana’’ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhāne āyatanasaddo vattati.
anya-e0804n0:588_6: ‘‘Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane’’tiādīsu kāraṇe vattatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:589_0: Nivāse ākāre ceva, jātidese ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n0:591_0: Lokāyataṁ nāma ‘‘sabbaṁ ucchiṭṭhaṁ, sabbaṁ nucchiṭṭhaṁ. Seto kāko,
anya-e0804n0:591_1: kāḷo bako iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā’’ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ titthiyasatthaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:591_3: yañca sandhāya bodhisatto asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito ‘‘na seve lokāyatikaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:591_5: Āyatiṁ hitaṁ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṁ, kintaṁ? Vitaṇḍasatthaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:591_6: Tañhi ganthaṁ nissāya sattā puññakriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.
anya-e0804n0:591_7: Aññatthāpi hi evaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘lokāyatasippanti ‘kāko seto, aṭṭhīnaṁ setattā, balākā rattā,
anya-e0804n0:591_8: lohitassa rattattā’ti evamādinayappavattaṁ paralokanibbānānaṁ paṭisedhakaṁ vitaṇḍasatthasippa’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:592_0: Yuta juta bhāsane. Bhāsanaṁ udīraṇaṁ. Yotati. Jotati.
anya-e0804n0:593_0: Jutadittiyaṁ. Jotati, vijjotati. Juti, joti. Kārite ‘‘joteti,
anya-e0804n0:593_2: Ettha ca jutīti āloko siri vā. Jotīti patāpo. Atha vā jotīti candādīni.
anya-e0804n0:593_3: Vuttampi ceta sirimāvimāna vatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘jotīti candimasūriyanakkhattatārakānaṁ sādhāraṇanāma’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:593_4: Atha vā ‘‘joti jotiparāyaṇo’’ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulādīsu jātattā ca rūpasobhāyuttattā ca, so ‘‘jotī’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:594_2: tathāpi idha nīlapītādīsu setavaṇṇoyeva gahetabbo payogadassanavasena. Setati. Setaṁ vatthaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:595_0: Setaṁ sitaṁ suci sukkaṁ, paṇḍaraṁ dhavalampi ca;
anya-e0804n0:597_0: Vatu vattane. Vattati, pavattati, saṁvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. Pavattaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:598_0: Kilota addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Kilotati, pakilotati, temetīti attho. Kārite pakiloteti, pakilotayati. Uṇhodakasmiṁ pakilotayitvā, temetvāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:600_0: Kita ñāṇe. Ketati. Ketanaṁ, ketako, saṅketo.
anya-e0804n0:602_0: Kati chedane. Maṁsaṁ kantati, vikantati, ayokanto. Sallakanto mahāvīro. Mā no ajja vikantiṁsu, rañño sūdā mahānase.
anya-e0804n0:603_1: Īkārantattā imasmā niggahītāgamo na hoti. Catati.
anya-e0804n0:606_0: Thāgatinivattiyaṁ. Thāti. Avatthā, vavatthānaṁ, vavatthitaṁ, vanatho.
anya-e0804n0:606_1: ‘‘Chetvā vanaṁ vanathañcā’’ti ettha hi mahantā rukkhā vanaṁ nāma,
anya-e0804n0:606_2: khuddakā pana tasmiṁ vane ṭhitattā vanatho nāma vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:607_0: Thu thutiyaṁ. Thavati, abhitthavati. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuti, abhitthuti.
anya-e0804n0:608_0: Yadi hi rūpinī siyā, paññā me vasumatī na sameyya;
anya-e0804n0:610_0: Tehi thutippasattho so, yenidaṁ thavitaṁ ñāṇaṁ, buddhaseṭṭho ca thomito. Tatra thavanāti pasaṁsanā. Pasaṁsāya hi anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:611_0: Thavanā ca pasaṁsā ca, silāghā vaṇṇanā thuti;
anya-e0804n0:613_1: Atrimā pāḷiyo – abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati,
anya-e0804n0:613_2: kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti. Thiyo naṁ paribhāsiṁsūti.
anya-e0804n0:613_4: Thīyati saṅghātaṁ gacchati gabbho etissāti thī.
anya-e0804n0:613_5: Ācariyā pana itthīsaddasseva evaṁ nibbacanaṁ vadanti, na thīsaddassa.
anya-e0804n0:614_0: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti thī iti no ruci;
anya-e0804n0:615_0: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti itthīti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n0:617_0: Ayaṁ vinicchayo patto, nicchayaṁ bho suṇātha me.
anya-e0804n0:620_0: Appānaṁ bahutā ñāye, gahite sati yujjati;
anya-e0804n0:621_0: Tathā hi ‘‘dve duve, taṇhā, tasiṇā’’ti nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:624_0: Icchatīti nare itthī, icchāpetīti vā pana;
anya-e0804n0:627_0: Itthī thī vanitā nārī, abalā bhīru sundarī;
anya-e0804n0:628_0: Kantā sīmaninī mātu-gāmo piyā ca kāminī.
anya-e0804n0:631_0: Gorī ca dārikā kaññā, kumārī ca kumārikā;
anya-e0804n0:633_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccati. Dasavassikā kaññāti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:633_3: Atho jaraṁ appattā yuvatītipi taruṇītipi māṇavikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:633_4: Jaraṁ pattā pana therītipi mahallikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:634_3: rājaputtī ca dārika’’nti ca ‘‘acchā kaṇhājinaṁ kañña’’nti ca imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ vasena yā itthī dārikāsaddena vattabbā,
anya-e0804n0:634_6: sāpi dārikāsaddena vattabbā jātā. Tathā ‘‘rājā kumāramādāya,
anya-e0804n0:634_8: niccaṁ nigaḷamaṇḍite’’ti ca imāsaṁ pana pāḷīnaṁ vasena yā itthī dārikāsadena vattabbā,
anya-e0804n0:634_12: Apicettha ‘‘rājakaññā rucā nāmā’’ti ca ‘‘tato maddimpi nhāpesuṁ,
anya-e0804n0:634_13: sivikaññā samāgatā’’ti ca imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ dassanato yā anibbiddhā vā hotu nibbiddhā vā, yāva jaraṁ na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0804n0:635_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ – yaṁ tumhehi ‘‘aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccatī’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:635_2: jātiyā aṭṭhavassiko’’ti vacanato aṭṭhavasso dārako hotu, ‘‘tatthaddasakumāraṁ so,
anya-e0804n0:635_3: ramamānaṁ sake pure’’ti pāḷiyaṁ pana puttadārehi saṁvaddho vessantaramahārājā kathaṁ ‘‘kumāro’’ti vattuṁ yujjissati dvādasavassātikkantattā?
anya-e0804n0:635_5: Bhagavā hi dhammissarattā vohārakusalatāya ca yaṁ yaṁ veneyyajanānurūpaṁ desanaṁ desetuṁ icchati, taṁ taṁ deseti eva,
anya-e0804n0:635_6: tasmā bhagavatā tassa mātāpitūnaṁ atthitaṁ sandhāya kumāraparihārena vaddhitattañca evaṁ desanā katā.
anya-e0804n0:635_7: Tathā hi āyasmā kumārakassapo kumāraparihārena vaddhitattā mahallakopi samāno kumārakassapotveva vohariyati.
anya-e0804n0:635_8: ‘‘Na vāyaṁ kumārako mattamaññāsī’’ti ettha pana sirasmiṁ palitesu jātesupi āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āyasmā mahākassapo tasmiṁ there adhimattavissāso hutvā komāravādena ovadanto kumārakoti avocāti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:635_9: Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassaṁ, tāva kumārakā, bālāti ca vuccanti,
anya-e0804n0:636_2: Abhimatthati dummedhaṁ vajiraṁvamhamayaṁ maṇiṁ. Sineruṁ matthaṁ katvā.
anya-e0804n0:637_0: Kuthi puthi luthi hiṁsāsaṁkilesesu. Kunthati. Kuntho, kunthakipillikaṁ. Disvāna patitaṁ sāmaṁ, puttakaṁ paṁsukunthitaṁ. Punthati. Lunthati.
anya-e0804n0:638_1: Nāthadhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsīsane cāti catūsvatthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n0:638_5: ‘‘sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkheyyā’tiādinā taṁ taṁ hitapaṭipattiṁ yācatīti attho,
anya-e0804n0:638_6: paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte vā guṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro bhagavā ‘nātho’ti vuccatīti nāthatīti nātho’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:638_7: Saddasatthavidū pana tesu catūsu atthesu nātha nādha iti dhātudvayaṁ paṭhanti.
anya-e0804n0:638_8: Attanobhāsattā pana tassa ‘‘nāthate nādhate’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:639_1: evaṁ sante yo koci yācako daliddo, so eva nātho siyā. Yo pana ayācako samiddho,
anya-e0804n0:639_2: so na nāthati na yācatīti anātho siyā’’ti? Na,
anya-e0804n0:639_3: nāthasaddo hi yācanatthādīsu pavattamāno lokasaṅketavasena uttamapurisesu nirūḷho,
anya-e0804n0:639_5: tena taṁ taṁ hitapaṭipattiṁ yācatīti nāthasaddassattho vutto.
anya-e0804n0:639_8: Natthi nātho etassāti vā anātho’’ti dabbapaṭisedhavasena,
anya-e0804n0:639_9: na pana ‘‘na nāthati na yācatīti anātho’’ti dhātuatthapaṭisedhavasena.
anya-e0804n0:639_10: Yo hi aññassa saraṇaṁ gati patiṭṭhā hoti, so nātho,
anya-e0804n0:639_11: yo ca aññassa saraṇaṁ gati patiṭṭhā na hoti,
anya-e0804n0:639_12: nāpi attano añño saraṇaṁ gati patiṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0804n0:639_16: Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṁ imasmiṁ ṭhāne ‘‘lokanātho tuvaṁ eko,
anya-e0804n0:639_17: saraṇaṁ sabbapāṇina’’nti ca ‘‘anāthānaṁ bhavaṁ nātho’’ti ca –
anya-e0804n0:642_1: Yasmā pana sāsane ca loke ca yācako ‘‘nātho’’ti na vuccati, ayācako ca ‘‘anātho’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:642_2: Lokassa pana saraṇaṁ ‘‘nātho’’ti vuccati. Yassa saraṇaṁ na vijjati, so ‘‘anātho’’ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n0:642_4: Tasmā paññavatā sabbesu ṭhānesu dhātuatthamattena lokasamaññaṁ anatidhāvitvā yathānurūpaṁ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:644_0: Satha seṭhille. Sathati. Sathalo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate rajaṁ. Siṭhilotipi pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n0:646_0: Kattha silāghāyaṁ. Katthati, vikatthati. Katthanā, vikatthanā. Tattha katthatīti pasaṁsati.
anya-e0804n0:646_3: aññaṁ janapadaṁ gato’’ti ca ‘‘idhekacco katthī hoti vikatthī,
anya-e0804n0:646_4: so katthati ‘ahamasmi sīlasampannoti vā vattasampannoti vā vikatthatī’ti’’ ca ādayo payogā.
anya-e0804n0:647_0: Byatha dukkhabhayacalanesu. Byathati. Bhantā byathitamānasā. Tato kumārābyathitā, sutvā luddassa bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:648_0: Sutha kutha katha hiṁsāyaṁ. Sothati. Kothati. Kathati.
anya-e0804n0:649_0: Patha gatiyaṁ. Pathati. Patho. Pathoti maggo.
anya-e0804n0:649_1: So duvidho mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo pakatimaggo ca paṇḍitehinibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbo paṭipadāsaṅkhāto ariyamaggo cāti.
anya-e0804n0:649_2: Tattha pakatimaggo uppannakiccākiccehi janehi pathiyati gacchiyatīti patho,
anya-e0804n0:649_3: paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuraṁ gantukāmehi kulaputtehi saddhāpātheyyaṁ gahetvā pathiyati paṭipajjiyatīti patho.
anya-e0804n0:649_4: Atha vā pātheti kārakaṁ puggalaṁ gameti nibbānaṁ sampāpetīti vā patho , paṭipadāyeva.
anya-e0804n0:657_0: Dā dāne. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Saddho dānaṁ dadāti deti, sīlaṁ ādadāti ādeti.
anya-e0804n0:657_2: Saddho assaddhaṁ dānaṁ dāpeti, sīlaṁ ādapeti, samādapeti. Ye dhammamevādapayanti santo.
anya-e0804n0:657_3: Imāni kāritapadāni hetukattupadānīti ca vuccanti taddīpakattā. Saddhena dānaṁ dīyati, sīlaṁ ādīyati, samādīyati,
anya-e0804n0:657_5: Ayañca dā dāneti dhātu sāsanānurūpasutivasena divādigaṇaṁ patvā supanakriyaṁ vadanto ‘‘dāyati niddāyati niddā’’ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati.
anya-e0804n0:657_6: Dānamavakhaṇḍanañca vadanto ‘‘diyati dānaṁ dātta’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati.
anya-e0804n0:657_7: Suddhiṁvadanto ‘‘dāyati vedāyati vodāna’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati,
anya-e0804n0:657_8: imasmiṁ pana bhūvādigaṇe dānaṁ vadanto āpubbavasena gahaṇañca vadanto ‘‘dadāti deti ādadāti ādeti dānaṁ ādāna’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati.
anya-e0804n0:657_9: Tathā kucchitagamanaṁ vadanto ‘‘dāti suddāti suddo suddī’’ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayatīti ayaṁ viseso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā cettha,
anya-e0804n0:658_0: Idānissa nāmapadāni tumantādīni brūma. ‘‘Dānaṁ, deyyaṁ, dātabbaṁ, brahmadeyyaṁ, dinnaṁ, dāyako, dāyikā, dakkhiṇā’’ iccādīni, ‘‘dātuṁ, padātuṁ, dātave, padātave, datvā, datvāna, dadātuna, daditvā, daditvāna, dadiya, dajjā, dadiyāna, ādātuṁ, ādāya,
anya-e0804n0:659_1: dadanti etenāti atthe na deyyadhammo dānacetanā ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:659_2: Kasmā pana tattha dinnasaddoyeva kathiyati, na dattasaddoti? Akathane kāraṇamatthi.
anya-e0804n0:659_3: ‘‘Dānaṁ dinna’’ntiādīsu hi dinnasaddaṭṭhāne dattasaddo na dissati, tasmā na kathiyati.
anya-e0804n0:661_0: ‘‘Manasā dānaṁ mayā dinnaṁ’’, iti dinnapadaṁ viya.
anya-e0804n0:664_0: Tasmā ‘‘devadatto’’tiādīsu ‘‘devena dinno’’ti samāsaṁ katvā paṇṇattivacanattā dinnasaddassa dattādeso kātabbo sāsanānurūpena.
anya-e0804n0:664_1: Upari hi ‘‘dinnassa datto kvaci paṇṇattiya’’nti lakkhaṇaṁ passissatha.
anya-e0804n0:664_2: Ayameva hi sāsane nīti avilaṅghanīyā. Idaṁ panettha vavatthānaṁ –
anya-e0804n0:675_0: Ediso pāḷiyaṁ natthi, nayo tasmā na so varo;
anya-e0804n0:685_0: Koci pana saddasatthavidū garu evaṁ saddaracanamakāsi –
anya-e0804n0:690_0: Ettha ca brahmadattanti idaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ, na pāḷito.
anya-e0804n0:690_1: Pāḷinayañhipatvā ‘‘brahmadattiya’’nti vā ‘‘brahmadinna’’nti vā ‘‘devadattiya’’nti vā ‘‘devadinna’’nti vā rūpena bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:690_2: Tathā hi ‘‘bodhisatto ca maddī ca sammodamānā sakkadattiye assame vasiṁsū’’ti pāḷinayānurūpo aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati. Tasmā etthevaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0804n0:693_1: Atra pana paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇavasena yathārahaṁ padakkamo bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:694_0: Dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma, dadāmase. Dadeyya, dade, dajjā. Dajjā sappuriso dānaṁ. Dadeyyuṁ, dajjuṁ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjuṁ. Dadeyyāsi, dajjāsi, dajjesi iccapi. Dajjāsi abhayaṁ mama. Mātaraṁ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino. Sīlavantesu dajjesi, dānaṁ maddi yathārahaṁ. Dadeyyātha, dajjātha. Dadeyyāmi, dajjāmi, dadeyyāma, dajjāma. Dadetha, daderaṁ. Dadetho, dadeyyāvho, dajjāvho. Dadeyyaṁ, dajjaṁ. Neva dajjaṁ mahosadhaṁ. Dadeyyāmhe, dajjāmhe. Ayamasmākaṁ khanti.
anya-e0804n0:694_1: Garūnaṁ pana khanti aññathā bhavati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:698_0: Na hi sabbappakārena, pāḷiyo paṭibhanti no.
anya-e0804n0:699_0: Tattha asmākaṁ khantiyā ‘‘dajjā dajja’’ntiādīni yyakārasahiteyeva sattamiyā padarūpe sijjhanti.
anya-e0804n0:699_1: ‘‘Dajjā sappuriso dāna’’nti ettha hi ‘‘dajjā idaṁ ‘‘dadeyyā’’ti padarūpaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṁ katvā tato tiṇṇaṁ byañjanānaṁ saṁyogañca tīsusaññogabyañjanesu dvinnaṁ sarūpānamekassa lopañca dyakārasaññogassa ca jakāradvayaṁ katvā tato dīghavasenuccāritabbattā animittaṁ dīghabhāvaṁ katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n0:699_4: Tesu yattha padacchedo labbhati, so padasandhi. Yathā? Tatrāyaṁ. Yattha pana na labbhati, so vaṇṇasandhi. Yathā? Atrajo. Yathā ca sugato, yathā ca paddhāni.
anya-e0804n0:699_5: Evaṁ duvidhesu sandhīsu ‘‘dajjā’’ti ayaṁ vaṇṇasandhi eva.
anya-e0804n0:701_0: ‘‘Ayaṁ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṁ parittakaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:703_2: Idaṁ pana datvāsaddena samānatthaṁ ‘‘dadiyya’’ iti padarūpaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṁ katvā saññogesu sarūpalopañca tato dyakārasaññogassa jjakāradvayaṁ dīghattañca katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n0:704_1: Tathā hi ‘‘petānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ dajjā’’ti ca ‘‘dakkhiṇā dajjā’’ti ca dve pāṭhā dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:704_2: Tattha pacchimassa dajjāti dātabbāti attho kammani yapaccayavasena.
anya-e0804n0:704_3: Idha pana dādhātuto yapaccayaṁ katvā dhātussa dvittañca pubbassa rassattañca tato yakāre pare saralopaṁ saññogabhāvañca jjakāradvayañca itthiliṅgattā āpaccayādiñca katvā ‘‘dajjā’’ti nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n0:704_4: Evaṁ ‘‘dajjā dadeyyā’’ti ca ‘‘dajjā dadiyya datvā’’ti ca ‘‘dajjā dātabbā’’ti ca etāni paccekaṁ pariyāyavacanāni bhavanti. ‘‘Dajjuṁ. Dajjāsi, dajjātha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjāvho,
anya-e0804n0:704_5: dajja’’nti etānipi ‘‘dadeyyuṁ dadeyyāsī’’tiādinā padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṁ saññogesu sarūpalopaṁ dyakārasamaññogassa jjakāradvayañca katvā nipphajjanti.
anya-e0804n0:704_6: Etesu dajjāsīti yaṁ rūpaṁ tassāvayavassa ākārassa ekāraṁ katvā aparampi ‘‘dajjesī’’ti rūpaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:705_0: Acinteyyānubhāvassa hi sammāsambuddhassa pāḷinayo acinteyyoyeva hoti, gambhīro dukkhogāḷho,
anya-e0804n0:705_3: Tathā hi ‘‘khattiyā titthiyā cetiyānī’’tiādīsu yakāre pare saralopo bhavati,
anya-e0804n0:705_7: Tathā ‘‘sākacchati taccha’’nti etthāpi ‘‘saha kathayatī’’tivā ‘‘saṁkathayatī’’ti vā ‘‘tathya’’nti ca padarūpaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā sahasaddassa hakāralopaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:705_8: saṁsadde ca niggahītalopaṁ katvā sakāragatassa sarassa dīghaṁ katvā yakāre pare saralopaṁ katvā tato thyakārasaññogassa cchayugaṁ katvā visabhāgasaññoge eko ekassa sabhāgattamāpajjati.
anya-e0804n0:705_10: Tathā hi ‘‘aññamaññaṁ sākacchiṁsu. Kālena dhammasākacchā. Bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:705_12: sammā so loke paribbajeyyā’’ti savikapāni payogāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:705_13: ‘‘Najjā’’tiādīsupi ‘‘nadiyā’’tiādīni padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā vaṇṇasandhivasena yakāre pare lopavidhi labbhatiyeva.
anya-e0804n0:705_15: upari ca etesaṁ sādhanatthaṁ ‘‘saralopo yamanarādīsū’’tiādīni lakkhaṇāni bhavissanti. Tattha –
anya-e0804n0:708_2: dajjāhaṁ dakarakkhino’’ti ettha dajjanti padassa ‘‘dammī’’ti vattamānāvasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva.
anya-e0804n0:708_3: Ācariyā hi ‘‘sattamīpayogo aya’’nti jānantāpi ‘‘kadāci aññe parikappatthampi gaṇheyyu’’nti āsaṅkāya evaṁ vivaraṇamakaṁsu.
anya-e0804n0:708_5: na dajjaṁ dakarakkhino’’ti ettha na dajjanti padassa ‘‘nāhaṁ dakarakkhassa dassāmī’’ti bhavissantīvasena vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva,
anya-e0804n0:708_6: anāgataṁ pana paṭicca vattabbatthattā evaṁ vivaraṇaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0804n0:708_7: ‘‘Neva dajjaṁ mahosadha’’nti ettha pana ‘‘na tveva dadeyya’’nti sattamīpayogavaseneva vivaraṇaṁ katanti.
anya-e0804n0:709_2: kassapo iti maṁ vidū’’tiādīsu vidūsaddena samaṁ. Dade, dadittha, dadaṁ, dadimha. Dadittha, dadire. Dadittho, dadivho.
anya-e0804n0:710_0: Ettha ca daditthoti idaṁ ‘‘sañjagghittho mayā saha. Mā kisittho mayā vinā.
anya-e0804n0:710_2: Iminā nayena sabbattha labbhamānavasena sadisatā upaparikkhitabbā. Dadaṁ, dadimhe. Parokkhāsahibharūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:711_0: Adadā, adadū. Adade, adadattha. Adadaṁ, adadamha. Adadattha, adadatthuṁ. Adadase, adadavhaṁ. Adadiṁ adadamhase.
anya-e0804n0:711_1: Iti anakārapubbampi rūpaṁ gahetabbaṁ ‘‘yesaṁ no na dadamhase’’ti dassanato. Hiyyattanīsahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:712_0: Adadi, adaduṁ, adadiṁsu. Adado, adadittha. Adadiṁ, adadimhā. Adadā, adadū. Adadase, adadivhaṁ. Adadaṁ, adadimhe. Ajjatanīsahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:714_1: dadissaṁsu’’ iccādi ca sabbaṁ neyyaṁ. Kālātipattisahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n0:715_0: Aparānipi vattamānādisahitarūpāni bhavanti. Deti, denti. Desi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Attanopadāni appasiddhāni.
anya-e0804n0:715_2: Hiyuttanīnayo pana ajjatanīnayo ca koci koci pasiddho pāḷiyaṁ āgatattā, sakkā ca ‘‘adā, adū, ado, ada’’ntiādinā yojetuṁ. Tathā hi nayo dissati. Adā dānaṁ purindado. Varañceme ado sakka. Brāhmaṇānaṁ adaṁ gajaṁ. Adāsime. Adaṁsu te mamokāsaṁ. Adāsiṁ brāhmaṇe tadāti. ‘‘Dassati,
anya-e0804n0:715_3: dassanti’’ iccādi sabbaṁ neyyaṁ. ‘‘Adassā, dassā, adassaṁsu, dassaṁsu,
anya-e0804n0:716_0: Tathā ādadāti, ādadanti. Ādadāsi, ādadātha. Ādadāmi, ādadāma.
anya-e0804n0:716_3: Ādetu ādeyya iccādi yathārahaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Evameva ca ‘‘dāpeti,
anya-e0804n0:717_0: Dākucchite gamane. Dāti. Suddāti. Suddo, suddī.
anya-e0804n0:717_2: parapothanādiluddācārakammunā dārukammādikhuddācārakammunā ca lahuṁ lahuṁ kucchitaṁ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:717_3: Tathā hi su iti sīghatthe nipāto,
anya-e0804n0:717_4: dā iti garahattho dhātu kucchitagativācakattā. Suddassa bhariyā suddī.
anya-e0804n0:718_1: Ettha ca davati gacchati mūlakkhandhasākhāviṭapapattapallavapupphaphalehi vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇātīti dumo.
anya-e0804n0:719_0: Desodhane. Sodhanaṁ pariyodāpanaṁ. Dāyati. Dāyanaṁ. Yathā gāyati, gāyanaṁ. Dāyituṁ, dāyitvā,
anya-e0804n0:720_2: Tathā hi ‘‘bālo abyatto nappaṭibalo anuyuñjiyamāno anuyogaṁ dātu’’nti ettha dātunti padassa sodhetunti attho.
anya-e0804n0:720_3: Keci ‘‘dānattha’’nti atthaṁ vadanti, taṁ na yuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:720_4: Na hi yo parehi anuyuñjiyati, so anuyogaṁ deti nāmāti.
anya-e0804n0:720_5: Tasmā ‘‘ācariyassa anuyogaṁ datvā bārāṇasiṁ paccāgacchī’’tiādīsupi anuyogaṁ datvāti anuyogaṁ sodhetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:720_6: Tathā hi pubbācariyehi ‘‘anuyogadāpanattha’’nti etasmiṁ padese esoyevattho vibhāvito. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0804n0:720_8: Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṁ nadanto atthato anuyogaṁ sodheti nāma,
anya-e0804n0:720_9: anuyuñjanto ca naṁ sodhāpeti nāmāti. Idampi ca tehi vuttaṁ. Dātunti sodhetuṁ.
anya-e0804n0:720_10: Keci ‘‘dānattha’’nti atthaṁ vadanti, taṁ na yuttaṁ. Na hi yo sīhanādaṁ nadati,
anya-e0804n0:720_12: Samantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇa saṁvaṇṇanāyampi pubbācariyehi ‘‘dānaṁ datvāti taṁ cetanaṁ pariyodāpetvā’’ti sodhanattho vutto.
anya-e0804n0:720_13: Dullabhā ayaṁ nīti sādhukaṁ citte ṭhapetabbā.
anya-e0804n0:721_0: De pālane. Dīyati. Dānaṁ, uddānaṁ dāyituṁ, dāyitvā.
anya-e0804n0:721_1: Tattha dānanti duggatito dāyati rakkhatīti dānaṁ, dānacetanā.
